416
417bool activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( player &p )
418{
419 if( !p.backlog.empty() ) {
420 player_activity &back_act = p.backlog.front();
421 if( back_act.is_multi_type() ) {
422 p.assign_activity( p.backlog.front().id() );
423 p.backlog.clear();
424 return true;
425 }
426 }
427 return false;
428}
429
430void activity_handlers::burrow_do_turn( player_activity *act, player * )
431{
432 sfx::play_activity_sound( "activity", "burrow", sfx::get_heard_volume( act->placement ) );
433 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
434 sounds::sound( act->placement, 10, sounds::sound_t::movement,
435 //~ Sound of a Rat mutant burrowing!
436 _( "ScratchCrunchScrabbleScurry." ) );
437 }
438}
439
440void activity_handlers::burrow_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
441{
442 tripoint pos = act->placement; // make a copy to avoid use-after-free
443 act->set_to_null(); // kill activity before inflicting pain
444 if( g->m.is_bashable( pos ) && g->m.has_flag( flag_SUPPORTS_ROOF, pos ) &&
445 g->m.ter( pos ) != t_tree ) {
446 // Tunneling through solid rock is hungry, sweaty, tiring, backbreaking work
447 // Not quite as bad as the pickaxe, though
448 p->mod_stored_nutr( 10 );
449 p->mod_thirst( 10 );
450 p->mod_fatigue( 15 );
451 p->mod_pain( 3 * rng( 1, 3 ) );
452 } else if( g->m.move_cost( pos ) == 2 && g->get_levz() == 0 &&
453 g->m.ter( pos ) != t_dirt && g->m.ter( pos ) != t_grass ) {
454 //Breaking up concrete on the surface? not nearly as bad
455 p->mod_stored_nutr( 5 );
456 p->mod_thirst( 5 );
457 p->mod_fatigue( 10 );
458 }
459 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish burrowing." ) );
460 g->m.destroy( pos, true );
461}
462
463static bool check_butcher_cbm( const int roll )
464{
465 // Failure rates for dissection rolls
466 // 90% at roll 0, 72% at roll 1, 60% at roll 2, 51% @ 3, 45% @ 4, 40% @ 5, ... , 25% @ 10
467 // Roll is roughly a rng(0, -3 + 1st_aid + fine_cut_quality + 1/2 electronics + small_dex_bonus)
468 // Roll is reduced by corpse damage level, but to no less than 0
469 add_msg( m_debug, _( "Roll = %i" ), roll );
470 add_msg( m_debug, _( "Failure chance = %f%%" ), ( 9.0f / ( 10.0f + roll * 2.5f ) ) * 100.0f );
471 const bool failed = x_in_y( 9, ( 10 + roll * 2.5 ) );
472 return !failed;
473}
474
475static void extract_or_wreck_cbms( const std::list<item> &cbms, int roll,
476 player &p )
477{
478 if( roll < 0 ) {
479 return;
480 }
481 for( item it : cbms ) {
482 // For some stupid reason, zombie pheromones are dropped using bionic type
483 // This complicates things
484 if( it.is_bionic() ) {
485 if( check_butcher_cbm( roll ) || it.typeId() == itype_burnt_out_bionic ) {
486 add_msg( m_good, _( "You discover a %s!" ), it.tname() );
487 } else {
488 // We convert instead of recreating so that it keeps flags and faults
489 it.convert( itype_burnt_out_bionic );
490 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your imprecise surgery damaged a bionic, producing a %s." ), it.tname() );
491 }
492 } else {
493 if( !check_butcher_cbm( roll ) ) {
494 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your imprecise surgery destroyed some organs." ) );
495 continue;
496 } else {
497 add_msg( m_good, _( "You discover a %s!" ), it.tname() );
498 }
499 }
500
501 if( it.type->phase == LIQUID ) {
502 // TODO: smarter NPC liquid handling
503 if( p.is_npc() ) {
504 drop_on_map( p, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { it }, p.pos() );
505 } else {
506 liquid_handler::handle_all_liquid( it, 1 );
507 }
508 } else {
509 get_map().add_item( p.pos(), it );
510 }
511 }
512}
513
514// TODO: Implement
515enum class butcherable_rating : int {
516 butcherable = 0,
517 no_tool,
518 no_tree_rope_rack,
519 no_table,
520 no_saw,
521 too_damaged,
522 already_dressed,
523 already_skinned,
524 already_quartered,
525 too_small,
526 needs_dressing,
527 warn_cannibalism,
528 info_tools
529};
530
531butchery_setup consider_butchery( const item &corpse_item, player &u, butcher_type action )
532{
533 butchery_setup setup;
534 setup.can_do = butchery_possibility::yes;
535 setup.type = action;
536 const auto wont_do = [&setup]( const std::string & msg, butcherable_rating ) {
537 setup.problems.emplace_back( msg );
538 setup.can_do = butchery_possibility::never;
539 };
540 const auto not_this_one = [&setup]( const std::string & msg, butcherable_rating ) {
541 setup.problems.emplace_back( msg );
542 if( setup.can_do != butchery_possibility::never ) {
543 setup.can_do = butchery_possibility::not_this;
544 }
545 };
546 const auto info = [&setup]( const std::string & msg, butcherable_rating ) {
547 setup.info.emplace_back( msg );
548 };
549 const auto need_confirm = [&setup]( const std::string & msg, butcherable_rating ) {
550 setup.problems.emplace_back( msg );
551 if( setup.can_do == butchery_possibility::yes ) {
552 setup.can_do = butchery_possibility::need_confirmation;
553 }
554 };
555
556 const inventory &inv = u.crafting_inventory();
557 const int factor = inv.max_quality( action == DISSECT ? qual_CUT_FINE : qual_BUTCHER );
558
559 const mtype &corpse = *corpse_item.get_mtype();
560
561 if( action != DISSECT && factor == INT_MIN ) {
562 wont_do( _( "None of your cutting tools are suitable for butchering." ),
563 butcherable_rating::no_tool );
564 }
565
566 if( action == DISSECT ) {
567 switch( factor ) {
568 case INT_MIN:
569 wont_do( _( "None of your tools are sharp and precise enough to do that." ),
570 butcherable_rating::no_tool );
571 break;
572 case 1:
573 info( _( "You could use a better tool, but this will do." ), butcherable_rating::info_tools );
574 break;
575 case 2:
576 info( _( "This tool is great, but you still would like a scalpel." ),
577 butcherable_rating::info_tools );
578 break;
579 case 3:
580 info( _( "You dissect the corpse with a trusty scalpel." ), butcherable_rating::info_tools );
581 break;
582 case 5:
583 info( _( "You dissect the corpse with a sophisticated system of surgical grade scalpels." ),
584 butcherable_rating::info_tools );
585 break;
586 }
587 }
588
589 bool has_tree_nearby = false;
590 for( const tripoint &pt : g->m.points_in_radius( u.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE ) ) {
591 if( g->m.has_flag( flag_TREE, pt ) ) {
592 has_tree_nearby = true;
593 break;
594 }
595 }
596 bool b_rack_present = false;
597 for( const tripoint &pt : g->m.points_in_radius( u.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE ) ) {
598 if( g->m.has_flag_furn( flag_BUTCHER_EQ, pt ) ) {
599 b_rack_present = true;
600 break;
601 }
602 }
603 if( !b_rack_present ) {
604 b_rack_present = inv.has_item_with( []( const item & it ) {
605 return it.has_flag( "BUTCHER_RACK" );
606 } );
607 }
608 // workshop butchery (full) prequisites
609 if( action == BUTCHER_FULL ) {
610 const bool has_rope = inv.has_amount( itype_rope_30, 1 ) ||
611 inv.has_amount( itype_rope_makeshift_30, 1 ) ||
612 inv.has_amount( itype_hd_tow_cable, 1 ) ||
613 inv.has_amount( itype_vine_30, 1 ) ||
614 inv.has_amount( itype_grapnel, 1 );
615 const bool big_corpse = corpse.size >= MS_MEDIUM;
616
617 if( big_corpse ) {
618 if( has_rope && !has_tree_nearby && !b_rack_present ) {
619 not_this_one(
620 _( "You need to suspend this corpse to butcher it. While you have a rope to lift the corpse, there is no tree nearby to hang it from." ),
621 butcherable_rating::no_tree_rope_rack );
622 }
623 if( !has_rope && !b_rack_present ) {
624 not_this_one(
625 _( "To perform a full butchery on a corpse this big, you need either a butchering rack, a nearby hanging meathook, or both a long rope in your inventory and a nearby tree to hang the corpse from." ),
626 butcherable_rating::no_tree_rope_rack );
627 }
628 if( !( g->m.has_nearby_table( u.pos(), PICKUP_RANGE ) || inv.has_item_with( []( const item & it ) {
629 return it.has_flag( "FLAT_SURFACE" );
630 } ) ) ) {
631 not_this_one(
632 _( "To perform a full butchery on a corpse this big, you need a table nearby or something else with a flat surface. A leather tarp spread out on the ground could suffice." ),
633 butcherable_rating::no_table );
634 }
635 }
636 }
637
638 if( action == DISSECT && ( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ||
639 corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) ) {
640 not_this_one( _( "It would be futile to search for implants inside this badly damaged corpse." ),
641 butcherable_rating::too_damaged );
642 }
643
644 if( action == F_DRESS && ( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ||
645 corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) ) {
646 not_this_one( _( "This corpse is already field dressed." ),
647 butcherable_rating::already_dressed );
648 }
649
650 if( action == SKIN && corpse_item.has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) ) {
651 not_this_one( _( "This corpse is already skinned." ), butcherable_rating::already_skinned );
652 }
653
654 if( action == QUARTER ) {
655 if( corpse.size == MS_TINY ) {
656 not_this_one( _( "This corpse is too small to quarter without damaging." ),
657 butcherable_rating::too_small );
658 }
659 if( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
660 not_this_one( _( "This is already quartered." ), butcherable_rating::already_quartered );
661 }
662 if( !( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ||
663 corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) &&
664 corpse_item.get_mtype()->harvest->has_entry_type( "offal" ) ) {
665 not_this_one( _( "You need to perform field dressing before quartering." ),
666 butcherable_rating::needs_dressing );
667 }
668 }
669
670 // applies to all butchery actions
671 const bool is_human = corpse.id == mtype_id::NULL_ID() || ( corpse.in_species( HUMAN ) &&
672 !corpse.in_species( ZOMBIE ) );
673 if( is_human && !( u.has_trait_flag( trait_flag_CANNIBAL ) ||
674 u.has_trait_flag( trait_flag_PSYCHOPATH ) ||
675 u.has_trait_flag( trait_flag_SAPIOVORE ) ) ) {
676 need_confirm( _( "Would you dare desecrate the mortal remains of a fellow human being?" ),
677 butcherable_rating::warn_cannibalism );
678 }
679
680 setup.move_cost = butcher_time_to_cut( inv, corpse_item, action );
681
682 return setup;
683}
684
685static void set_up_butchery_activity( player_activity &act, player &u, const butchery_setup &setup )
686{
687 const auto print_reasons = [&u, &setup]() {
688 for( const std::string &prob : setup.problems ) {
689 u.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, prob );
690 }
691 if( setup.problems.empty() ) {
692 for( const std::string &info : setup.info ) {
693 u.add_msg_if_player( m_info, info );
694 }
695 }
696 };
697
698 if( setup.can_do == butchery_possibility::never ) {
699 act.set_to_null();
700 print_reasons();
701 return;
702 }
703 if( setup.can_do == butchery_possibility::not_this ) {
704 act.targets.pop_back();
705 print_reasons();
706 return;
707 }
708 if( setup.can_do == butchery_possibility::need_confirmation ) {
709 if( u.is_player() ) {
710 if( query_yn( _( "Would you dare desecrate the mortal remains of a fellow human being?" ) ) ) {
711 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
712 case 1:
713 u.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You clench your teeth at the prospect of this gruesome job." ) );
714 break;
715 case 2:
716 u.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "This will haunt you in your dreams." ) );
717 break;
718 case 3:
719 u.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
720 _( "You try to look away, but this gruesome image will stay on your mind for some time." ) );
721 break;
722 }
723 g->u.add_morale( MORALE_BUTCHER, -50, 0, 2_days, 3_hours );
724 } else {
725 u.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "It needs a coffin, not a knife." ) );
726 act.targets.pop_back();
727 return;
728 }
729 } else {
730 u.add_morale( MORALE_BUTCHER, -50, 0, 2_days, 3_hours );
731 }
732 }
733
734 print_reasons();
735 act.moves_left = setup.move_cost;
736 // We have a valid target, so preform the full finish function
737 // instead of just selecting the next valid target
738 act.index = false;
739}
740
741static int size_factor_in_time_to_cut( m_size size )
742{
743 switch( size ) {
744 // Time (roughly) in turns to cut up the corpse
745 case MS_TINY:
746 return 150;
747 case MS_SMALL:
748 return 300;
749 case MS_MEDIUM:
750 return 450;
751 case MS_LARGE:
752 return 600;
753 case MS_HUGE:
754 return 1800;
755 default:
756 debugmsg( "Invalid m_size value for butchering corpse: %d", static_cast<int>( size ) );
757 break;
758 }
759 return 0;
760}
761
762int butcher_time_to_cut( const inventory &inv, const item &corpse_item, const butcher_type action )
763{
764 const mtype &corpse = *corpse_item.get_mtype();
765 const int initial_factor = inv.max_quality( action == DISSECT ? qual_CUT_FINE : qual_BUTCHER );
766 // Multiplier for dissection, since it uses different "quality units"
767 const int factor = action == DISSECT ? ( initial_factor * 15 ) : initial_factor;
768
769 int time_to_cut = size_factor_in_time_to_cut( corpse.size );
770 // At factor 0, base 100 time_to_cut remains 100. At factor 50, it's 50 , at factor 75 it's 25
771 time_to_cut *= std::max( 25, 100 - factor );
772 if( time_to_cut < 3000 ) {
773 time_to_cut = 3000;
774 }
775
776 switch( action ) {
777 case BUTCHER:
778 break;
779 case BUTCHER_FULL:
780 if( !corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) || corpse_item.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) {
781 time_to_cut *= 6;
782 } else {
783 time_to_cut *= 4;
784 }
785 break;
786 case F_DRESS:
787 case SKIN:
788 time_to_cut *= 2;
789 break;
790 case QUARTER:
791 time_to_cut = std::max( 1000, time_to_cut / 4 );
792 break;
793 case DISMEMBER:
794 time_to_cut = std::max( 400, time_to_cut / 10 );
795 break;
796 case DISSECT:
797 time_to_cut *= 7;
798 break;
799 }
800
801 if( corpse_item.has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
802 time_to_cut /= 4;
803 }
804 time_to_cut = time_to_cut * ( 10 - g->u.get_crafting_helpers( 3 ).size() ) / 10;
805 return time_to_cut;
806}
807
808// this function modifies the input weight by its damage level, depending on the bodypart
809static int corpse_damage_effect( int weight, const std::string &entry_type, int damage_level )
810{
811 const float slight_damage = 0.9;
812 const float damage = 0.75;
813 const float high_damage = 0.5;
814 const int destroyed = 0;
815
816 switch( damage_level ) {
817 case 2:
818 // "damaged"
819 if( entry_type == "offal" ) {
820 return std::round( weight * damage );
821 }
822 if( entry_type == "skin" ) {
823 return std::round( weight * damage );
824 }
825 if( entry_type == "flesh" ) {
826 return std::round( weight * slight_damage );
827 }
828 break;
829 case 3:
830 // "mangled"
831 if( entry_type == "offal" ) {
832 return destroyed;
833 }
834 if( entry_type == "skin" ) {
835 return std::round( weight * high_damage );
836 }
837 if( entry_type == "bone" ) {
838 return std::round( weight * slight_damage );
839 }
840 if( entry_type == "flesh" ) {
841 return std::round( weight * damage );
842 }
843 break;
844 case 4:
845 // "pulped"
846 if( entry_type == "offal" ) {
847 return destroyed;
848 }
849 if( entry_type == "skin" ) {
850 return destroyed;
851 }
852 if( entry_type == "bone" ) {
853 return std::round( weight * damage );
854 }
855 if( entry_type == "flesh" ) {
856 return std::round( weight * high_damage );
857 }
858 break;
859 default:
860 // "bruised" modifier is almost impossible to avoid; also includes no modifier (zero damage)
861 break;
862 }
863 return weight;
864}
865
866static void butchery_drops_harvest( item *corpse_item, const mtype &mt, player &p,
867 const std::function<int()> &roll_butchery, butcher_type action,
868 const std::function<double()> &roll_drops )
869{
870 p.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, mt.harvest->message() );
871 int monster_weight = to_gram( mt.weight );
872 monster_weight += std::round( monster_weight * rng_float( -0.1, 0.1 ) );
873 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
874 monster_weight *= 0.95;
875 }
876 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_GIBBED ) ) {
877 monster_weight = std::round( 0.85 * monster_weight );
878 if( action != F_DRESS ) {
879 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
880 _( "You salvage what you can from the corpse, but it is badly damaged." ) );
881 }
882 }
883 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) ) {
884 monster_weight = std::round( 0.85 * monster_weight );
885 }
886 int practice = 4 + roll_butchery();
887
888 if( mt.harvest.is_null() ) {
889 debugmsg( "ERROR: %s has no harvest entry.", mt.id.c_str() );
890 return;
891 }
892
893 for( const harvest_entry &entry : *mt.harvest ) {
894 const int butchery = roll_butchery();
895 const float min_num = entry.base_num.first + butchery * entry.scale_num.first;
896 const float max_num = entry.base_num.second + butchery * entry.scale_num.second;
897 int roll = 0;
898 // mass_ratio will override the use of base_num, scale_num, and max
899 if( entry.mass_ratio != 0.00f ) {
900 roll = static_cast<int>( std::round( entry.mass_ratio * monster_weight ) );
901 roll = corpse_damage_effect( roll, entry.type, corpse_item->damage_level( 4 ) );
902 } else if( entry.type != "bionic" && entry.type != "bionic_group" ) {
903 roll = std::min<int>( entry.max, std::round( rng_float( min_num, max_num ) ) );
904 // will not give less than min_num defined in the JSON
905 roll = std::max<int>( corpse_damage_effect( roll, entry.type, corpse_item->damage_level( 4 ) ),
906 entry.base_num.first );
907 }
908 const itype *drop = nullptr;
909 if( entry.type != "bionic_group" ) {
910 drop = &*itype_id( entry.drop );
911 }
912
913 // BIONIC handling - no code for DISSECT to let the bionic drop fall through
914 if( entry.type == "bionic" || entry.type == "bionic_group" ) {
915 if( action == F_DRESS ) {
916 if( drop != nullptr && !drop->bionic ) {
917 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
918 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
919 _( "You notice some strange organs, perhaps harvestable via careful dissection." ) );
920 }
921 continue;
922 }
923 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
924 _( "You notice there are bionics implanted in this corpse, that careful dissection might preserve." ) );
925 continue;
926 }
927 if( action == BUTCHER || action == BUTCHER_FULL || action == DISMEMBER ) {
928 if( drop != nullptr && !drop->bionic ) {
929 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
930 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
931 _( "Your butchering tool destroys a strange organ. Perhaps a more surgical approach would allow harvesting it." ) );
932 }
933 continue;
934 }
935 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
936 case 1:
937 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
938 _( "Your butchering tool encounters something implanted in this corpse, but your rough cuts destroy it." ) );
939 break;
940 case 2:
941 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
942 _( "You find traces of implants in the body, but you care only for the flesh." ) );
943 break;
944 case 3:
945 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
946 _( "You found some bionics in the body, but harvesting them would require more surgical approach." ) );
947 break;
948 }
949 continue;
950 }
951 }
952
953 // Check if monster was gibbed, and handle accordingly
954 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_GIBBED ) && ( entry.type == "flesh" || entry.type == "bone" ) ) {
955 roll /= 2;
956 }
957
958 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) && entry.type == "skin" ) {
959 roll = 0;
960 }
961
962 // QUICK BUTCHERY
963 if( action == BUTCHER ) {
964 if( entry.type == "flesh" ) {
965 roll = roll / 4;
966 } else if( entry.type == "bone" ) {
967 roll /= 2;
968 } else if( corpse_item->get_mtype()->size >= MS_MEDIUM && ( entry.type == "skin" ) ) {
969 roll /= 2;
970 } else if( entry.type == "offal" ) {
971 roll /= 5;
972 } else {
973 continue;
974 }
975 }
976 // RIP AND TEAR
977 if( action == DISMEMBER ) {
978 if( entry.type == "flesh" ) {
979 roll /= 6;
980 } else {
981 continue;
982 }
983 }
984 // field dressing ignores everything outside below list
985 if( action == F_DRESS ) {
986 if( entry.type == "bone" ) {
987 roll = rng( 0, roll / 2 );
988 }
989 if( entry.type == "flesh" ) {
990 continue;
991 }
992 if( entry.type == "skin" ) {
993 continue;
994 }
995 }
996
997 // you only get the skin from skinning
998 if( action == SKIN ) {
999 if( entry.type != "skin" ) {
1000 continue;
1001 }
1002 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) {
1003 roll = rng( 0, roll );
1004 }
1005 }
1006
1007 // field dressing removed innards and bones from meatless limbs
1008 if( ( action == BUTCHER_FULL || action == BUTCHER ) && corpse_item->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ) {
1009 if( entry.type == "offal" ) {
1010 continue;
1011 }
1012 if( entry.type == "bone" ) {
1013 roll = ( roll / 2 ) + rng( roll / 2, roll );
1014 }
1015 }
1016 // unskillfull field dressing may damage the skin, meat, and other parts
1017 if( ( action == BUTCHER_FULL || action == BUTCHER ) &&
1018 corpse_item->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) {
1019 if( entry.type == "offal" ) {
1020 continue;
1021 }
1022 if( entry.type == "bone" ) {
1023 roll = ( roll / 2 ) + rng( roll / 2, roll );
1024 }
1025 if( entry.type == "flesh" || entry.type == "skin" ) {
1026 roll = rng( 0, roll );
1027 }
1028 }
1029 // quartering ruins skin
1030 if( corpse_item->has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
1031 if( entry.type == "skin" ) {
1032 //not continue to show fail effect
1033 roll = 0;
1034 } else {
1035 roll /= 4;
1036 }
1037 }
1038
1039 if( entry.type != "bionic" && entry.type != "bionic_group" ) {
1040 // divide total dropped weight by drop's weight to get amount
1041 if( entry.mass_ratio != 0.00f ) {
1042 // apply skill before converting to items, but only if mass_ratio is defined
1043 roll *= roll_drops();
1044 roll = std::ceil( static_cast<double>( roll ) /
1045 to_gram( drop->weight ) );
1046 }
1047
1048 if( roll <= 0 ) {
1049 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You fail to harvest: %s" ), drop->nname( 1 ) );
1050 continue;
1051 }
1052 if( drop->phase == LIQUID ) {
1053 item obj( drop, calendar::turn, roll );
1054 if( obj.goes_bad() ) {
1055 obj.set_rot( corpse_item->get_rot() );
1056 }
1057 for( const std::string &flg : entry.flags ) {
1058 obj.set_flag( flg );
1059 }
1060 for( const fault_id &flt : entry.faults ) {
1061 obj.faults.emplace( flt );
1062 }
1063 // TODO: smarter NPC liquid handling
1064 if( p.is_npc() ) {
1065 drop_on_map( p, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { obj }, p.pos() );
1066 } else {
1067 liquid_handler::handle_all_liquid( obj, 1 );
1068 }
1069 } else if( drop->count_by_charges() ) {
1070 item obj( drop, calendar::turn, roll );
1071 if( obj.goes_bad() ) {
1072 obj.set_rot( corpse_item->get_rot() );
1073 }
1074 for( const std::string &flg : entry.flags ) {
1075 obj.set_flag( flg );
1076 }
1077 for( const fault_id &flt : entry.faults ) {
1078 obj.faults.emplace( flt );
1079 }
1080 if( !p.backlog.empty() && p.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ) {
1081 obj.set_var( "activity_var", p.name );
1082 }
1083 g->m.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), obj );
1084 } else {
1085 item obj( drop, calendar::turn );
1086 obj.set_mtype( &mt );
1087 if( obj.goes_bad() ) {
1088 obj.set_rot( corpse_item->get_rot() );
1089 }
1090 for( const std::string &flg : entry.flags ) {
1091 obj.set_flag( flg );
1092 }
1093 for( const fault_id &flt : entry.faults ) {
1094 obj.faults.emplace( flt );
1095 }
1096 if( !p.backlog.empty() && p.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ) {
1097 obj.set_var( "activity_var", p.name );
1098 }
1099 for( int i = 0; i != roll; ++i ) {
1100 g->m.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), obj );
1101 }
1102 }
1103 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You harvest: %s" ), drop->nname( roll ) );
1104 }
1105 practice++;
1106 }
1107 // 20% of the original corpse weight is not an item, but liquid gore
1108
1109 if( action != DISSECT ) {
1110 p.practice( skill_survival, std::max( 0, practice ), std::max( mt.size - MS_MEDIUM, 0 ) + 4 );
1111 }
1112}
1113
1114static void butchery_quarter( item *corpse_item, const player &p )
1115{
1116 corpse_item->set_flag( flag_QUARTERED );
1117 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1118 _( "You roughly slice the corpse of %s into four parts and set them aside." ),
1119 corpse_item->get_mtype()->nname() );
1120 // 4 quarters (one exists, add 3, flag does the rest)
1121 for( int i = 1; i <= 3; i++ ) {
1122 g->m.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), *corpse_item, true );
1123 }
1124}
1125
1126void activity_handlers::butcher_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1127{
1128 // No targets means we are done
1129 if( act->targets.empty() ) {
1130 act->set_to_null();
1131 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
1132 return;
1133 }
1134
1135 item_location target = act->targets.back();
1136 const inventory &inv = p->crafting_inventory();
1137
1138 // Corpses can disappear (rezzing!), so check for that
1139 if( !target || !target->is_corpse() ) {
1140 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's no corpse to butcher!" ) );
1141 act->set_to_null();
1142 return;
1143 }
1144
1145 butcher_type action = BUTCHER;
1146 if( act->id() == ACT_BUTCHER ) {
1147 action = BUTCHER;
1148 } else if( act->id() == ACT_BUTCHER_FULL ) {
1149 action = BUTCHER_FULL;
1150 } else if( act->id() == ACT_FIELD_DRESS ) {
1151 action = F_DRESS;
1152 } else if( act->id() == ACT_QUARTER ) {
1153 action = QUARTER;
1154 } else if( act->id() == ACT_DISSECT ) {
1155 action = DISSECT;
1156 } else if( act->id() == ACT_SKIN ) {
1157 action = SKIN;
1158 } else if( act->id() == ACT_DISMEMBER ) {
1159 action = DISMEMBER;
1160 }
1161
1162 // index is a bool that determines if we are ready to start the next target
1163 if( act->index ) {
1164 const butchery_setup setup = consider_butchery( *target, *p, action );
1165 set_up_butchery_activity( *act, *p, setup );
1166 return;
1167 }
1168
1169 item &corpse_item = *target;
1170 const mtype *corpse = corpse_item.get_mtype();
1171 const field_type_id type_blood = corpse->bloodType();
1172 const field_type_id type_gib = corpse->gibType();
1173
1174 if( action == QUARTER ) {
1175 butchery_quarter( &corpse_item, *p );
1176 act->index = true;
1177 return;
1178 }
1179
1180 int skill_level = p->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
1181 int factor = inv.max_quality( action == DISSECT ? qual_CUT_FINE :
1182 qual_BUTCHER );
1183
1184 // DISSECT has special case factor calculation and results.
1185 if( action == DISSECT ) {
1186 skill_level = p->get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
1187 skill_level += inv.max_quality( qual_CUT_FINE );
1188 skill_level += p->get_skill_level( skill_electronics ) / 2;
1189 add_msg( m_debug, _( "Skill: %s" ), skill_level );
1190 }
1191
1192 const auto roll_butchery = [&]() {
1193 double skill_shift = 0.0;
1194 ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL randomly increases butcher rolls
1195 skill_shift += rng_float( 0, skill_level - 3 );
1196 ///\EFFECT_DEX >8 randomly increases butcher rolls, slightly, <8 decreases
1197 skill_shift += rng_float( 0, p->get_dex() - 8 ) / 4.0;
1198
1199 if( factor < 0 ) {
1200 skill_shift -= rng_float( 0, -factor / 5.0 );
1201 }
1202
1203 return static_cast<int>( std::round( skill_shift ) );
1204 };
1205
1206 if( action == DISMEMBER ) {
1207 g->m.add_splatter( type_gib, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1208 }
1209
1210 //all BUTCHERY types - FATAL FAILURE
1211 if( action != DISSECT && roll_butchery() <= ( -15 ) && one_in( 2 ) ) {
1212 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
1213 case 1:
1214 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1215 _( "You hack up the corpse so unskillfully, that there is nothing left to salvage from this bloody mess." ) );
1216 break;
1217 case 2:
1218 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1219 _( "You wanted to cut the corpse, but instead you hacked the meat, spilled the guts all over it, and made a bloody mess." ) );
1220 break;
1221 case 3:
1222 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1223 _( "You made so many mistakes during the process that you doubt even vultures will be interested in what's left of it." ) );
1224 break;
1225 }
1226
1227 // Remove the target from the map
1228 target.remove_item();
1229 act->targets.pop_back();
1230
1231 g->m.add_splatter( type_gib, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1232 g->m.add_splatter( type_blood, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1233 for( int i = 1; i <= corpse->size; i++ ) {
1234 g->m.add_splatter_trail( type_gib, p->pos(), random_entry( g->m.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1235 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1236 g->m.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, p->pos(), random_entry( g->m.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1237 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1238 }
1239
1240 // Ready to move on to the next item, if there is one
1241 act->index = true;
1242 return;
1243 }
1244 // function just for drop yields
1245 const auto roll_drops = [&]() {
1246 factor = std::max( factor, -50 );
1247 return 0.5 * skill_level / 10 + 0.3 * ( factor + 50 ) / 100 + 0.2 * p->dex_cur / 20;
1248 };
1249 // all action types - yields
1250 butchery_drops_harvest( &corpse_item, *corpse, *p, roll_butchery, action, roll_drops );
1251 // after this point, if there was a liquid handling from the harvest,
1252 // and the liquid handling was interrupted, then the activity was canceled,
1253 // therefore operations on this activities targets and values may be invalidated.
1254 // reveal hidden items / hidden content
1255 if( action == DISSECT ) {
1256 int roll = roll_butchery() - corpse_item.damage_level( 4 );
1257 roll = roll < 0 ? 0 : roll;
1258 add_msg( m_debug, _( "Roll penalty for corpse damage = %s" ), 0 - corpse_item.damage_level( 4 ) );
1259 std::list<item> cbms = corpse_item.components;
1260 for( const item *it : corpse_item.contents.all_items_top() ) {
1261 cbms.push_back( *it );
1262 }
1263 extract_or_wreck_cbms( cbms, roll, *p );
1264 // those lines are for XP gain with dissecting. It depends on the size of the corpse, time to dissect the corpse and the amount of bionics you would gather.
1265 int time_to_cut = size_factor_in_time_to_cut( corpse->size );
1266 int level_cap = std::min<int>( MAX_SKILL, ( corpse->size + ( cbms.size() * 2 + 1 ) ) );
1267 int size_mult = corpse->size > MS_MEDIUM ? ( corpse->size * corpse->size ) : 8;
1268 int practice_amt = ( size_mult + 1 ) * ( ( time_to_cut / 150 ) + 1 ) *
1269 ( cbms.size() * cbms.size() / 2 + 1 );
1270 p->practice( skill_firstaid, practice_amt, level_cap );
1271 add_msg( m_debug, "Experience: %d, Level cap: %d, Time to cut: %d", practice_amt, level_cap,
1272 time_to_cut );
1273 }
1274
1275 //end messages and effects
1276 switch( action ) {
1277 case QUARTER:
1278 break;
1279 case BUTCHER:
1280 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1281 _( "You apply few quick cuts to the %s and leave what's left of it for scavengers." ),
1282 corpse_item.tname() );
1283
1284 // Remove the target from the map
1285 target.remove_item();
1286 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1287 act->targets.pop_back();
1288 }
1289 break;
1290 case BUTCHER_FULL:
1291 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish butchering the %s." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1292
1293 // Remove the target from the map
1294 target.remove_item();
1295 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1296 act->targets.pop_back();
1297 }
1298 break;
1299 case F_DRESS:
1300 // partial failure
1301 if( roll_butchery() < 0 ) {
1302 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
1303 case 1:
1304 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1305 _( "You unskillfully hack up the corpse and chop off some excess body parts. You're left wondering how you did so poorly." ) );
1306 break;
1307 case 2:
1308 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1309 _( "Your unskilled hands slip and damage the corpse. You still hope it's not a total waste though." ) );
1310 break;
1311 case 3:
1312 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1313 _( "You did something wrong and hacked the corpse badly. Maybe it's still recoverable." ) );
1314 break;
1315 }
1316 corpse_item.set_flag( "FIELD_DRESS_FAILED" );
1317
1318 g->m.add_splatter( type_gib, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1319 g->m.add_splatter( type_blood, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1320 for( int i = 1; i <= corpse->size; i++ ) {
1321 g->m.add_splatter_trail( type_gib, p->pos(), random_entry( g->m.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1322 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1323 g->m.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, p->pos(), random_entry( g->m.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1324 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1325 }
1326
1327 } else {
1328 // success
1329 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
1330 case 1:
1331 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You field dress the %s." ), corpse->nname() );
1332 break;
1333 case 2:
1334 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1335 _( "You slice the corpse's belly and remove intestines and organs, until you're confident that it will not rot from inside." ) );
1336 break;
1337 case 3:
1338 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1339 _( "You remove guts and excess parts, preparing the corpse for later use." ) );
1340 break;
1341 }
1342 corpse_item.set_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS );
1343
1344 g->m.add_splatter( type_gib, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1345 g->m.add_splatter( type_blood, p->pos(), rng( corpse->size + 2, ( corpse->size + 1 ) * 2 ) );
1346 for( int i = 1; i <= corpse->size; i++ ) {
1347 g->m.add_splatter_trail( type_gib, p->pos(), random_entry( g->m.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1348 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1349 g->m.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, p->pos(), random_entry( g->m.points_in_radius( p->pos(),
1350 corpse->size + 1 ) ) );
1351 }
1352
1353 }
1354 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1355 act->targets.pop_back();
1356 }
1357 break;
1358 case SKIN:
1359 switch( rng( 1, 4 ) ) {
1360 case 1:
1361 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You skin the %s." ), corpse->nname() );
1362 break;
1363 case 2:
1364 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You carefully remove the hide from the %s" ),
1365 corpse->nname() );
1366 break;
1367 case 3:
1368 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1369 _( "The %s is challenging to skin, but you get a good hide from it." ),
1370 corpse->nname() );
1371 break;
1372 case 4:
1373 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "With a few deft slices you take the skin from the %s" ),
1374 corpse->nname() );
1375 break;
1376 }
1377 corpse_item.set_flag( flag_SKINNED );
1378 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1379 act->targets.pop_back();
1380 }
1381 break;
1382 case DISMEMBER:
1383 switch( rng( 1, 3 ) ) {
1384 case 1:
1385 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You hack the %s apart." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1386 break;
1387 case 2:
1388 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You lop the limbs off the %s." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1389 break;
1390 case 3:
1391 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You cleave the %s into pieces." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1392 }
1393
1394 // Remove the target from the map
1395 target.remove_item();
1396 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1397 act->targets.pop_back();
1398 }
1399 break;
1400 case DISSECT:
1401 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish dissecting the %s." ), corpse_item.tname() );
1402
1403 // Remove the target from the map
1404 target.remove_item();
1405 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1406 act->targets.pop_back();
1407 }
1408 break;
1409 }
1410
1411 // Ready to move on to the next item, if there is one (for example if multibutchering)
1412 act->index = true;
1413 // if its mutli-tile butchering,then restart the backlog.
1414 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
1415}
1416
1417void activity_handlers::shear_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1418{
1419 if( act->coords.empty() ) {
1420 debugmsg( "shearing activity with no position of monster stored" );
1421 return;
1422 }
1423 item_location &loc = act->targets[ 0 ];
1424 item *shears = loc.get_item();
1425 if( shears == nullptr ) {
1426 debugmsg( "shearing item location lost" );
1427 return;
1428 }
1429 const tripoint source_pos = g->m.getlocal( act->coords.at( 0 ) );
1430 monster *source_mon = g->critter_at<monster>( source_pos );
1431 if( source_mon == nullptr ) {
1432 debugmsg( "could not find source creature for shearing" );
1433 return;
1434 }
1435 // 22 wool staples corresponds to an average wool-producing sheep yield of 10 lbs or so
1436 for( int i = 0; i != 22; ++i ) {
1437 item wool_staple( itype_wool_staple, calendar::turn );
1438 g->m.add_item_or_charges( p->pos(), wool_staple );
1439 }
1440 source_mon->add_effect( effect_sheared, calendar::season_length() );
1441 if( !act->str_values.empty() && act->str_values[0] == "temp_tie" ) {
1442 source_mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
1443 }
1444 act->set_to_null();
1445 if( shears->type->can_have_charges() ) {
1446 p->consume_charges( *shears, shears->type->charges_to_use() );
1447 }
1448}
1449
1450void activity_handlers::milk_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1451{
1452 if( act->coords.empty() ) {
1453 debugmsg( "milking activity with no position of monster stored" );
1454 return;
1455 }
1456 const tripoint source_pos = g->m.getlocal( act->coords.at( 0 ) );
1457 monster *source_mon = g->critter_at<monster>( source_pos );
1458 if( source_mon == nullptr ) {
1459 debugmsg( "could not find source creature for liquid transfer" );
1460 return;
1461 }
1462 auto milked_item = source_mon->ammo.find( source_mon->type->starting_ammo.begin()->first );
1463 if( milked_item == source_mon->ammo.end() ) {
1464 debugmsg( "animal has no milkable ammo type" );
1465 return;
1466 }
1467 if( milked_item->second <= 0 ) {
1468 debugmsg( "started milking but udders are now empty before milking finishes" );
1469 return;
1470 }
1471 item milk( milked_item->first, calendar::turn, milked_item->second );
1472 if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid( milk, nullptr, 1, nullptr, nullptr, -1, source_mon ) ) {
1473 milked_item->second = 0;
1474 if( milk.charges > 0 ) {
1475 milked_item->second = milk.charges;
1476 } else {
1477 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s's udders run dry." ), source_mon->get_name() );
1478 }
1479 }
1480 // if the monster was not manually tied up, but needed to be fixed in place temporarily then
1481 // remove that now.
1482 if( !act->str_values.empty() && act->str_values[0] == "temp_tie" ) {
1483 source_mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
1484 }
1485 act->set_to_null();
1486}
1487
1488void activity_handlers::fill_liquid_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
1489{
1490 player_activity &act_ref = *act;
1491 try {
1492 // 1. Gather the source item.
1493 vehicle *source_veh = nullptr;
1494 const tripoint source_pos = act_ref.coords.at( 0 );
1495 map_stack source_stack = g->m.i_at( source_pos );
1496 map_stack::iterator on_ground;
1497 monster *source_mon = nullptr;
1498 item liquid;
1499 const liquid_source_type source_type = static_cast<liquid_source_type>( act_ref.values.at( 0 ) );
1500 int part_num = -1;
1501 int veh_charges = 0;
1502 switch( source_type ) {
1503 case LST_VEHICLE:
1504 source_veh = veh_pointer_or_null( g->m.veh_at( source_pos ) );
1505 if( source_veh == nullptr ) {
1506 throw std::runtime_error( "could not find source vehicle for liquid transfer" );
1507 }
1508 deserialize( liquid, act_ref.str_values.at( 0 ) );
1509 part_num = static_cast<int>( act_ref.values.at( 1 ) );
1510 veh_charges = liquid.charges;
1511 break;
1512 case LST_INFINITE_MAP:
1513 deserialize( liquid, act_ref.str_values.at( 0 ) );
1514 liquid.charges = item::INFINITE_CHARGES;
1515 break;
1516 case LST_MAP_ITEM:
1517 if( static_cast<size_t>( act_ref.values.at( 1 ) ) >= source_stack.size() ) {
1518 throw std::runtime_error( "could not find source item on ground for liquid transfer" );
1519 }
1520 on_ground = source_stack.begin();
1521 std::advance( on_ground, act_ref.values.at( 1 ) );
1522 liquid = *on_ground;
1523 break;
1524 case LST_MONSTER:
1525 Creature *c = g->critter_at( source_pos );
1526 source_mon = dynamic_cast<monster *>( c );
1527 if( source_mon == nullptr ) {
1528 debugmsg( "could not find source creature for liquid transfer" );
1529 act_ref.set_to_null();
1530 }
1531 deserialize( liquid, act_ref.str_values.at( 0 ) );
1532 liquid.charges = 1;
1533 break;
1534 }
1535
1536 static const units::volume volume_per_second = units::from_liter( 4.0F / 6.0F );
1537 const int charges_per_second = std::max( 1, liquid.charges_per_volume( volume_per_second ) );
1538 liquid.charges = std::min( charges_per_second, liquid.charges );
1539 const int original_charges = liquid.charges;
1540
1541 // 2. Transfer charges.
1542 switch( static_cast<liquid_target_type>( act_ref.values.at( 2 ) ) ) {
1543 case LTT_VEHICLE:
1544 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = g->m.veh_at( act_ref.coords.at( 1 ) ) ) {
1545 p->pour_into( vp->vehicle(), liquid );
1546 } else {
1547 throw std::runtime_error( "could not find target vehicle for liquid transfer" );
1548 }
1549 break;
1550 case LTT_CONTAINER:
1551 p->pour_into( p->i_at( act_ref.values.at( 3 ) ), liquid );
1552 break;
1553 case LTT_MAP:
1554 if( iexamine::has_keg( act_ref.coords.at( 1 ) ) ) {
1555 iexamine::pour_into_keg( act_ref.coords.at( 1 ), liquid );
1556 } else {
1557 g->m.add_item_or_charges( act_ref.coords.at( 1 ), liquid );
1558 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You pour %1$s onto the ground." ), liquid.tname() );
1559 liquid.charges = 0;
1560 }
1561 break;
1562 case LTT_MONSTER:
1563 liquid.charges = 0;
1564 break;
1565 }
1566
1567 const int removed_charges = original_charges - liquid.charges;
1568 if( removed_charges == 0 ) {
1569 // Nothing has been transferred, target must be full.
1570 act_ref.set_to_null();
1571 return;
1572 }
1573
1574 // 3. Remove charges from source.
1575 switch( source_type ) {
1576 case LST_VEHICLE:
1577 if( part_num != -1 ) {
1578 source_veh->drain( part_num, removed_charges );
1579 liquid.charges = veh_charges - removed_charges;
1580 // If there's no liquid left in this tank we're done, otherwise
1581 // we need to update our liquid serialization to reflect how
1582 // many charges are actually left for the next time we come
1583 // around this loop.
1584 if( !liquid.charges ) {
1585 act_ref.set_to_null();
1586 } else {
1587 if( act_ref.str_values.empty() ) {
1588 act_ref.str_values.push_back( std::string() );
1589 }
1590 act_ref.str_values.at( 0 ) = serialize( liquid );
1591 }
1592 } else {
1593 source_veh->drain( liquid.typeId(), removed_charges );
1594 }
1595 if( source_veh->fuel_left( liquid.typeId() ) <= 0 ) {
1596 act_ref.set_to_null();
1597 }
1598 break;
1599 case LST_MAP_ITEM:
1600 on_ground->charges -= removed_charges;
1601 if( on_ground->charges <= 0 ) {
1602 source_stack.erase( on_ground );
1603 if( g->m.ter( source_pos ).obj().examine == &iexamine::gaspump ) {
1604 add_msg( _( "With a clang and a shudder, the %s pump goes silent." ),
1605 liquid.type_name( 1 ) );
1606 } else if( g->m.furn( source_pos ).obj().examine == &iexamine::fvat_full ) {
1607 add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %s from the vat." ),
1608 liquid.type_name( 1 ) );
1609 map_stack items_here = g->m.i_at( source_pos );
1610 if( items_here.empty() ) {
1611 g->m.furn_set( source_pos, f_fvat_empty );
1612 }
1613 }
1614 act_ref.set_to_null();
1615 }
1616 break;
1617 case LST_INFINITE_MAP:
1618 // nothing, the liquid source is infinite
1619 break;
1620 case LST_MONSTER:
1621 // liquid source charges handled in monexamine::milk_source
1622 if( liquid.charges == 0 ) {
1623 act_ref.set_to_null();
1624 }
1625 break;
1626 }
1627
1628 if( removed_charges < original_charges ) {
1629 // Transferred less than the available charges -> target must be full
1630 act_ref.set_to_null();
1631 }
1632
1633 } catch( const std::runtime_error &err ) {
1634 debugmsg( "error in activity data: \"%s\"", err.what() );
1635 act_ref.set_to_null();
1636 return;
1637 }
1638}
1639
1640void activity_handlers::firstaid_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1641{
1642 static const std::string iuse_name_string( "heal" );
1643
1644 item &it = *act->targets.front();
1645 item *used_tool = it.get_usable_item( iuse_name_string );
1646 if( used_tool == nullptr ) {
1647 debugmsg( "Lost tool used for healing" );
1648 act->set_to_null();
1649 return;
1650 }
1651
1652 const use_function *use_fun = used_tool->get_use( iuse_name_string );
1653 const heal_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const heal_actor *>( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
1654 if( actor == nullptr ) {
1655 debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
1656 act->set_to_null();
1657 return;
1658 }
1659
1660 // TODO: Store the patient somehow, retrieve here
1661 player &patient = *p;
1662 const hp_part healed = static_cast<hp_part>( act->values[0] );
1663 const int charges_consumed = actor->finish_using( *p, patient, *used_tool, healed );
1664 p->consume_charges( it, charges_consumed );
1665
1666 // Erase activity and values.
1667 act->set_to_null();
1668 act->values.clear();
1669}
1670
1671void activity_handlers::forage_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1672{
1673 // Don't forage if we aren't next to the bush - otherwise we get weird bugs
1674 bool next_to_bush = false;
1675 for( const tripoint &pnt : g->m.points_in_radius( p->pos(), 1 ) ) {
1676 if( g->m.getabs( pnt ) == act->placement ) {
1677 next_to_bush = true;
1678 break;
1679 }
1680 }
1681
1682 if( !next_to_bush ) {
1683 act->set_to_null();
1684 return;
1685 }
1686
1687 const int veggy_chance = rng( 1, 100 );
1688 bool found_something = false;
1689
1690 item_group_id loc;
1691 ter_str_id next_ter;
1692
1693 switch( season_of_year( calendar::turn ) ) {
1694 case SPRING:
1695 loc = item_group_id( "forage_spring" );
1696 next_ter = ter_str_id( "t_underbrush_harvested_spring" );
1697 break;
1698 case SUMMER:
1699 loc = item_group_id( "forage_summer" );
1700 next_ter = ter_str_id( "t_underbrush_harvested_summer" );
1701 break;
1702 case AUTUMN:
1703 loc = item_group_id( "forage_autumn" );
1704 next_ter = ter_str_id( "t_underbrush_harvested_autumn" );
1705 break;
1706 case WINTER:
1707 loc = item_group_id( "forage_winter" );
1708 next_ter = ter_str_id( "t_underbrush_harvested_winter" );
1709 break;
1710 default:
1711 debugmsg( "Invalid season" );
1712 }
1713
1714 g->m.ter_set( g->m.getlocal( act->placement ), next_ter );
1715
1716 // Survival gives a bigger boost, and Perception is leveled a bit.
1717 // Both survival and perception affect time to forage
1718
1719 ///\EFFECT_PER slightly increases forage success chance
1720 ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases forage success chance
1721 if( veggy_chance < p->get_skill_level( skill_survival ) * 3 + p->per_cur - 2 ) {
1722 const std::vector<item *> dropped = g->m.put_items_from_loc( loc, p->pos(), calendar::turn );
1723 for( item *it : dropped ) {
1724 add_msg( m_good, _( "You found: %s!" ), it->tname() );
1725 found_something = true;
1726 if( it->has_flag( flag_FORAGE_POISON ) && one_in( 10 ) ) {
1727 it->set_flag( flag_HIDDEN_POISON );
1728 it->poison = rng( 2, 7 );
1729 }
1730 if( it->has_flag( flag_FORAGE_HALLU ) && !it->has_flag( flag_HIDDEN_POISON ) && one_in( 10 ) ) {
1731 it->set_flag( flag_HIDDEN_HALLU );
1732 }
1733 }
1734 }
1735 // 10% to drop a item/items from this group.
1736 if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
1737 const std::vector<item *> dropped = g->m.put_items_from_loc( item_group_id( "trash_forest" ),
1738 p->pos(),
1739 calendar::turn );
1740 for( item * const &it : dropped ) {
1741 add_msg( m_good, _( "You found: %s!" ), it->tname() );
1742 found_something = true;
1743 }
1744 }
1745
1746 if( !found_something ) {
1747 add_msg( _( "You didn't find anything." ) );
1748 }
1749
1750 iexamine::practice_survival_while_foraging( p );
1751
1752 act->set_to_null();
1753}

1755void activity_handlers::generic_game_do_turn( player_activity * /*act*/, player *p )
1756{
1757 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
1758 p->add_morale( MORALE_GAME, 4, 60 );
1759 }
1760}
1761
1762void activity_handlers::game_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
1763{
1764 item &game_item = *act->targets.front();
1765
1766 // Consume battery charges for every minute spent playing
1767 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
1768 bool fail = false;
1769 int const ammo_required = game_item.ammo_required();
1770 if( game_item.has_flag( flag_USE_UPS ) ) {
1771 fail = !p->use_charges_if_avail( itype_UPS, ammo_required );
1772 } else {
1773 fail = game_item.ammo_consume( ammo_required, p->pos() ) == 0;
1774 }
1775
1776 if( !fail ) {
1777 //1 points/min, almost 2 hours to fill
1778 p->add_morale( MORALE_GAME, 1, 100 );
1779 } else {
1780 act->moves_left = 0;
1781 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s runs out of batteries." ), game_item.tname() );
1782 }
1783 }
1784}
1785
1786void activity_handlers::hotwire_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1787{
1788 //Grab this now, in case the vehicle gets shifted
1789 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = g->m.veh_at( g->m.getlocal( tripoint( act->values[0],
1790 act->values[1],
1791 p->posz() ) ) ) ) {
1792 vehicle *const veh = &vp->vehicle();
1793 const int mech_skill = act->values[2];
1794 if( mech_skill > static_cast<int>( rng( 1, 6 ) ) ) {
1795 //success
1796 veh->is_locked = false;
1797 add_msg( _( "This wire will start the engine." ) );
1798 } else if( mech_skill > static_cast<int>( rng( 0, 4 ) ) ) {
1799 //soft fail
1800 veh->is_locked = false;
1801 veh->is_alarm_on = veh->has_security_working();
1802 add_msg( _( "This wire will probably start the engine." ) );
1803 } else if( veh->is_alarm_on ) {
1804 veh->is_locked = false;
1805 add_msg( _( "By process of elimination, this wire will start the engine." ) );
1806 } else {
1807 //hard fail
1808 veh->is_alarm_on = veh->has_security_working();
1809 add_msg( _( "The red wire always starts the engine, doesn't it?" ) );
1810 }
1811 } else {
1812 debugmsg( "process_activity ACT_HOTWIRE_CAR: vehicle not found" );
1813 }
1814 act->set_to_null();
1815}

1817void activity_handlers::longsalvage_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1818{
1819 static const std::string salvage_string = "salvage";
1820 item &main_tool = p->i_at( act->index );
1821 map_stack items = g->m.i_at( p->pos() );
1822 item *salvage_tool = main_tool.get_usable_item( salvage_string );
1823 if( salvage_tool == nullptr ) {
1824 debugmsg( "Lost tool used for long salvage" );
1825 act->set_to_null();
1826 return;
1827 }
1828
1829 const use_function *use_fun = salvage_tool->get_use( salvage_string );
1830 const salvage_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const salvage_actor *>( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
1831 if( actor == nullptr ) {
1832 debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
1833 act->set_to_null();
1834 return;
1835 }
1836
1837 for( item &it : items ) {
1838 if( actor->valid_to_cut_up( it ) ) {
1839 item_location item_loc( map_cursor( p->pos() ), &it );
1840 actor->cut_up( *p, *salvage_tool, item_loc );
1841 return;
1842 }
1843 }
1844
1845 add_msg( _( "You finish salvaging." ) );
1846 act->set_to_null();
1847}
1848
1849void activity_handlers::make_zlave_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1850{
1851 act->set_to_null();
1852 map_stack items = g->m.i_at( p->pos() );
1853 const std::string corpse_name = act->str_values[0];
1854 item *body = nullptr;
1855
1856 for( item &it : items ) {
1857 if( it.display_name() == corpse_name ) {
1858 body = &it;
1859 }
1860 }
1861
1862 if( body == nullptr ) {
1863 add_msg( m_info, _( "There's no corpse to make into a zombie slave!" ) );
1864 return;
1865 }
1866
1867 int success = act->values[0];
1868
1869 if( success > 0 ) {
1870
1871 p->practice( skill_firstaid, rng( 2, 5 ) );
1872 p->practice( skill_survival, rng( 2, 5 ) );
1873
1874 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
1875 _( "You slice muscles and tendons, and remove body parts until you're confident the zombie won't be able to attack you when it reanimates." ) );
1876
1877 body->set_var( "zlave", "zlave" );
1878 //take into account the chance that the body yet can regenerate not as we need.
1879 if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
1880 body->set_var( "zlave", "mutilated" );
1881 }
1882
1883 } else if( success > -20 ) {
1884
1885 p->practice( skill_firstaid, rng( 3, 6 ) );
1886 p->practice( skill_survival, rng( 3, 6 ) );
1887
1888 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1889 _( "You hack into the corpse and chop off some body parts. You think the zombie won't be able to attack when it reanimates." ) );
1890
1891 success += rng( 1, 20 );
1892
1893 if( success > 0 && !one_in( 5 ) ) {
1894 body->set_var( "zlave", "zlave" );
1895 } else {
1896 body->set_var( "zlave", "mutilated" );
1897 }
1898
1899 } else {
1900
1901 p->practice( skill_firstaid, rng( 1, 8 ) );
1902 p->practice( skill_survival, rng( 1, 8 ) );
1903
1904 body->mod_damage( rng( 0, body->max_damage() - body->damage() ), DT_STAB );
1905 if( body->damage() == body->max_damage() ) {
1906 body->active = false;
1907 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You cut up the corpse too much, it is thoroughly pulped." ) );
1908 } else {
1909 p->add_msg_if_player( m_warning,
1910 _( "You cut into the corpse trying to make it unable to attack, but you don't think you have it right." ) );
1911 }
1912 }
1913}

1925
1926void activity_handlers::pickaxe_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
1927{
1928 map &here = get_map();
1929 const tripoint pos( here.getlocal( act->placement ) );
1930 // Invalidate the activity early to prevent a query from mod_pain()
1931 act->set_to_null();
1932 if( p->is_avatar() ) {
1933 const int helpersize = g->u.get_crafting_helpers( 3 ).size();
1934 if( here.is_bashable( pos ) && here.has_flag( flag_SUPPORTS_ROOF, pos ) &&
1935 here.ter( pos ) != t_tree ) {
1936 // Tunneling through solid rock is hungry, sweaty, tiring, backbreaking work
1937 // Betcha wish you'd opted for the J-Hammer ;P
1938 p->mod_stored_nutr( 15 - ( helpersize * 3 ) );
1939 p->mod_thirst( 15 - ( helpersize * 3 ) );
1940 if( p->has_trait( trait_STOCKY_TROGLO ) ) {
1941 // Yep, dwarves can dig longer before tiring
1942 p->mod_fatigue( 20 - ( helpersize * 3 ) );
1943 } else {
1944 p->mod_fatigue( 30 - ( helpersize * 3 ) );
1945 }
1946 p->mod_pain( std::max( 0, ( 2 * static_cast<int>( rng( 1, 3 ) ) ) - helpersize ) );
1947 } else if( here.move_cost( pos ) == 2 && g->get_levz() == 0 &&
1948 here.ter( pos ) != t_dirt && here.ter( pos ) != t_grass ) {
1949 //Breaking up concrete on the surface? not nearly as bad
1950 p->mod_stored_nutr( 5 - ( helpersize ) );
1951 p->mod_thirst( 5 - ( helpersize ) );
1952 p->mod_fatigue( 10 - ( helpersize * 2 ) );
1953 }
1954 }
1955 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
1956 _( "You finish digging." ),
1957 _( "<npcname> finishes digging." ) );
1958 here.destroy( pos, true );
1959 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
1960 item &it = *act->targets.front();
1961 p->consume_charges( it, it.ammo_required() );
1962 } else {
1963 debugmsg( "pickaxe activity targets empty" );
1964 }
1965 if( resume_for_multi_activities( *p ) ) {
1966 for( item &elem : here.i_at( pos ) ) {
1967 elem.set_var( "activity_var", p->name );
1968 }
1969 }
1970}
1971
1972void activity_handlers::pulp_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
1973{
1974 const tripoint &pos = g->m.getlocal( act->placement );
1975
1976 // Stabbing weapons are a lot less effective at pulping
1977 const int cut_power = std::max( p->weapon.damage_melee( DT_CUT ),
1978 p->weapon.damage_melee( DT_STAB ) / 2 );
1979
1980 ///\EFFECT_STR increases pulping power, with diminishing returns
1981 float pulp_power = std::sqrt( ( p->str_cur + p->weapon.damage_melee( DT_BASH ) ) *
1982 ( cut_power + 1.0f ) );
1983 float pulp_effort = p->str_cur + p->weapon.damage_melee( DT_BASH );
1984 // Multiplier to get the chance right + some bonus for survival skill
1985 pulp_power *= 40 + p->get_skill_level( skill_survival ) * 5;
1986
1987 const int mess_radius = p->weapon.has_flag( flag_MESSY ) ? 2 : 1;
1988
1989 int moves = 0;
1990 // use this to collect how many corpse are pulped
1991 int &num_corpses = act->index;
1992 map_stack corpse_pile = g->m.i_at( pos );
1993 for( item &corpse : corpse_pile ) {
1994 const mtype *corpse_mtype = corpse.get_mtype();
1995 if( !corpse.is_corpse() || !corpse_mtype->has_flag( MF_REVIVES ) ||
1996 ( std::find( act->str_values.begin(), act->str_values.end(), "auto_pulp_no_acid" ) !=
1997 act->str_values.end() && corpse_mtype->bloodType().obj().has_acid ) ) {
1998 // Don't smash non-rezing corpses //don't smash acid zombies when auto pulping
1999 continue;
2000 }
2001
2002 while( corpse.damage() < corpse.max_damage() ) {
2003 // Increase damage as we keep smashing ensuring we eventually smash the target.
2004 if( x_in_y( pulp_power, corpse.volume() / units::legacy_volume_factor ) ) {
2005 corpse.inc_damage( DT_BASH );
2006 if( corpse.damage() == corpse.max_damage() ) {
2007 num_corpses++;
2008 }
2009 }
2010
2011 if( x_in_y( pulp_power, corpse.volume() / units::legacy_volume_factor ) ) {
2012 // Splatter some blood around
2013 // Splatter a bit more randomly, so that it looks cooler
2014 const int radius = mess_radius + x_in_y( pulp_power, 500 ) + x_in_y( pulp_power, 1000 );
2015 const tripoint dest( pos + point( rng( -radius, radius ), rng( -radius, radius ) ) );
2016 const field_type_id type_blood = ( mess_radius > 1 && x_in_y( pulp_power, 10000 ) ) ?
2017 corpse.get_mtype()->gibType() :
2018 corpse.get_mtype()->bloodType();
2019 g->m.add_splatter_trail( type_blood, pos, dest );
2020 }
2021
2022 p->mod_stamina( -pulp_effort );
2023
2024 if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
2025 // Smashing may not be butchery, but it involves some zombie anatomy
2026 p->practice( skill_survival, 2, 2 );
2027 }
2028
2029 float stamina_ratio = static_cast<float>( p->get_stamina() ) / p->get_stamina_max();
2030 moves += 100 / std::max( 0.25f, stamina_ratio );
2031 if( stamina_ratio < 0.33 || p->is_npc() ) {
2032 p->moves = std::min( 0, p->moves - moves );
2033 return;
2034 }
2035 if( moves >= p->moves ) {
2036 // Enough for this turn;
2037 p->moves -= moves;
2038 return;
2039 }
2040 }
2041 corpse.set_flag( flag_PULPED );
2042 }
2043 // If we reach this, all corpses have been pulped, finish the activity
2044 act->moves_left = 0;
2045 if( num_corpses == 0 ) {
2046 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The corpse moved before you could finish smashing it!" ) );
2047 return;
2048 }
2049 // TODO: Factor in how long it took to do the smashing.
2050 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( vgettext( "The corpse is thoroughly pulped.",
2051 "The corpses are thoroughly pulped.", num_corpses ),
2052 vgettext( "<npcname> finished pulping the corpse.",
2053 "<npcname> finished pulping the corpses.", num_corpses ) );
2054}

2056void activity_handlers::pulp_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )

2058 if( p->is_npc() ) {
2059 npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( p );
2060 guy->revert_after_activity();
2061 } else {
2062 act->set_to_null();
2063 }

2065
2066void activity_handlers::reload_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2067{
2068 act->set_to_null();
2069
2070 if( act->targets.size() != 2 || act->index <= 0 ) {
2071 debugmsg( "invalid arguments to ACT_RELOAD" );
2072 return;
2073 }
2074
2075 if( !act->targets[0] ) {
2076 debugmsg( "reload target is null, failed to reload" );
2077 return;
2078 }
2079
2080 if( !act->targets[1] ) {
2081 debugmsg( "ammo target is null, failed to reload" );
2082 return;
2083 }
2084
2085 item &reloadable = *act->targets[ 0 ];
2086 item &ammo = *act->targets[1];
2087 std::string ammo_name = ammo.tname();
2088 const int qty = act->index;
2089 const bool is_speedloader = ammo.has_flag( flag_SPEEDLOADER );
2090 const bool ammo_is_filthy = ammo.is_filthy();
2091
2092 if( !reloadable.reload( *p, std::move( act->targets[ 1 ] ), qty ) ) {
2093 add_msg( m_info, _( "Can't reload the %s." ), reloadable.tname() );
2094 return;
2095 }
2096
2097 std::string msg = _( "You reload the %s." );
2098
2099 if( ammo_is_filthy ) {
2100 reloadable.set_flag( "FILTHY" );
2101 }
2102
2103 if( reloadable.get_var( "dirt", 0 ) > 7800 ) {
2104 msg =
2105 _( "You manage to loosen some debris and make your %s somewhat operational." );
2106 reloadable.set_var( "dirt", ( reloadable.get_var( "dirt", 0 ) - rng( 790, 2750 ) ) );
2107 }
2108
2109 if( reloadable.is_gun() ) {
2110 p->recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
2111
2112 if( reloadable.has_flag( flag_RELOAD_ONE ) && !is_speedloader ) {
2113 for( int i = 0; i != qty; ++i ) {
2114 msg = _( "You insert one %2$s into the %1$s." );
2115 }
2116 }
2117 if( reloadable.type->gun->reload_noise_volume > 0 ) {
2118 sfx::play_variant_sound( "reload", reloadable.typeId().str(),
2119 sfx::get_heard_volume( p->pos() ) );
2120 sounds::ambient_sound( p->pos(), reloadable.type->gun->reload_noise_volume,
2121 sounds::sound_t::activity, reloadable.type->gun->reload_noise );
2122 }
2123 } else if( reloadable.is_watertight_container() ) {
2124 msg = _( "You refill the %s." );
2125 }
2126 add_msg( m_neutral, msg, reloadable.tname(), ammo_name );
2127}

2129void activity_handlers::start_fire_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )

2131 static const std::string iuse_name_string( "firestarter" );
2132
2133 item &it = *act->targets.front();
2134 item *used_tool = it.get_usable_item( iuse_name_string );
2135 if( used_tool == nullptr ) {
2136 debugmsg( "Lost tool used for starting fire" );
2137 act->set_to_null();
2138 return;
2139 }
2140
2141 const use_function *use_fun = used_tool->get_use( iuse_name_string );
2142 const firestarter_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>
2143 ( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );

2158
2159void activity_handlers::start_fire_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
2160{
2161 if( !g->m.is_flammable( act->placement ) ) {
2162 try_fuel_fire( *act, *p, true );
2163 if( !g->m.is_flammable( act->placement ) ) {
2164 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's nothing to light there." ) );
2165 p->cancel_activity();
2166 return;
2167 }
2168 }
2169
2170 item &firestarter = *act->targets.front();
2171 if( firestarter.has_flag( flag_REQUIRES_TINDER ) ) {
2172 if( !g->m.tinder_at( act->placement ) ) {
2173 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "This item requires tinder to light." ) );
2174 p->cancel_activity();
2175 return;
2176 }
2177 }
2178
2179 const use_function *usef = firestarter.type->get_use( "firestarter" );
2180 if( usef == nullptr || usef->get_actor_ptr() == nullptr ) {
2181 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You have lost the item you were using to start the fire." ) );
2182 p->cancel_activity();
2183 return;
2184 }
2185
2186 p->mod_moves( -p->moves );
2187 const firestarter_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>( usef->get_actor_ptr() );
2188 const float light = actor->light_mod( p->pos() );
2189 act->moves_left -= light * 100;
2190 if( light < 0.1 ) {
2191 add_msg( m_bad, _( "There is not enough sunlight to start a fire now. You stop trying." ) );
2192 p->cancel_activity();
2193 }
2194}
2195
2196static bool magic_train( player_activity *act, player *p )
2197{
2198 if( !p ) {
2199 return false;
2200 }
2201 const spell_id &sp_id = spell_id( act->name );
2202 if( sp_id.is_valid() ) {
2203 const bool knows = g->u.magic->knows_spell( sp_id );
2204 if( knows ) {
2205 spell &studying = p->magic->get_spell( sp_id );
2206 const int expert_multiplier = act->values.empty() ? 0 : act->values[0];
2207 const int xp = roll_remainder( studying.exp_modifier( *p ) * expert_multiplier );
2208 studying.gain_exp( xp );
2209 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You learn a little about the spell: %s" ),
2210 sp_id->name );
2211 } else {
2212 p->magic->learn_spell( act->name, *p );
2213 // you can decline to learn this spell , as it may lock you out of other magic.
2214 if( p->magic->knows_spell( sp_id ) ) {
2215 add_msg( m_good, _( "You learn %s." ), sp_id->name.translated() );
2216 } else {
2217 act->set_to_null();
2218 }
2219 }
2220 return true;
2221 }
2222 return false;
2223}

2225void activity_handlers::train_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2226{
2227 const skill_id sk( act->name );
2228 if( sk.is_valid() ) {
2229 const Skill &skill = sk.obj();
2230 std::string skill_name = skill.name();
2231 int old_skill_level = p->get_skill_level( sk );
2232 p->get_skill_level_object( sk ).train( 100, true );
2233 int new_skill_level = p->get_skill_level( sk );
2234 if( old_skill_level != new_skill_level ) {
2235 add_msg( m_good, _( "You finish training %s to level %d." ),
2236 skill_name, new_skill_level );
2237 g->events().send<event_type::gains_skill_level>( p->getID(), sk, new_skill_level );
2238 } else {
2239 add_msg( m_good, _( "You get some training in %s." ), skill_name );
2240 }
2241 act->set_to_null();
2242 return;
2243 }
2244
2245 const matype_id &ma_id = matype_id( act->name );
2246 if( ma_id.is_valid() ) {
2247 const martialart &mastyle = ma_id.obj();
2248 // Trained martial arts,
2249 g->events().send<event_type::learns_martial_art>( p->getID(), ma_id );
2250 p->martial_arts_data->learn_style( mastyle.id, p->is_avatar() );
2251 } else if( !magic_train( act, p ) ) {
2252 debugmsg( "train_finish without a valid skill or style or spell name" );
2253 }
2254
2255 act->set_to_null();
2256 return;
2257}

2259void activity_handlers::vehicle_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2260{
2261 //Grab this now, in case the vehicle gets shifted
2262 const optional_vpart_position vp = g->m.veh_at( g->m.getlocal( tripoint( act->values[0],
2263 act->values[1],
2264 p->posz() ) ) );
2265 veh_interact::complete_vehicle( *p );
2266 // complete_vehicle set activity type to NULL if the vehicle
2267 // was completely dismantled, otherwise the vehicle still exist and
2268 // is to be examined again.
2269 if( act->is_null() ) {
2270 if( npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( p ) ) {
2271 guy->revert_after_activity();
2272 guy->set_moves( 0 );
2273 }
2274 return;
2275 }
2276 act->set_to_null();
2277 if( !p->is_npc() ) {
2278 if( act->values.size() < 7 ) {
2279 debugmsg( "process_activity invalid ACT_VEHICLE values:%d",
2280 act->values.size() );
2281 } else {
2282 if( vp ) {
2283 g->m.invalidate_map_cache( g->get_levz() );
2284 // TODO: Z (and also where the activity is queued)
2285 // Or not, because the vehicle coordinates are dropped anyway
2286 if( !resume_for_multi_activities( *p ) ) {
2287 g->exam_vehicle( vp->vehicle(), point( act->values[ 2 ], act->values[ 3 ] ) );
2288 }
2289 return;
2290 } else {
2291 debugmsg( "process_activity ACT_VEHICLE: vehicle not found" );
2292 }
2293 }
2294 }

2297void activity_handlers::hand_crank_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
2298{
2299 // Hand-crank chargers seem to range from 2 watt (very common easily verified)
2300 // to 10 watt (suspicious claims from some manufacturers) sustained output.
2301 // It takes 2.4 minutes to produce 1kj at just slightly under 7 watts (25 kj per hour)
2302 // time-based instead of speed based because it's a sustained activity
2303 item &hand_crank_item = *act->targets.front();
2304
2305 if( calendar::once_every( 144_seconds ) ) {
2306 p->mod_fatigue( 1 );
2307 if( hand_crank_item.ammo_capacity() > hand_crank_item.ammo_remaining() ) {
2308 hand_crank_item.ammo_set( itype_battery, hand_crank_item.ammo_remaining() + 1 );
2309 } else {
2310 act->moves_left = 0;
2311 add_msg( m_info, _( "You've charged the battery completely." ) );
2312 }
2313 }
2314 if( p->get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::dead_tired ) {
2315 act->moves_left = 0;
2316 add_msg( m_info, _( "You're too exhausted to keep cranking." ) );
2317 }
2318
2319}
2320
2321void activity_handlers::vibe_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
2322{
2323 //Using a vibrator takes time (10 minutes), not speed
2324 //Linear increase in morale during action with a small boost at end
2325 //Deduct 1 battery charge for every minute in use, or vibrator is much less effective
2326 item &vibrator_item = *act->targets.front();
2327
2328 if( p->encumb( bp_mouth ) >= 30 ) {
2329 act->moves_left = 0;
2330 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You have trouble breathing, and stop." ) );
2331 }
2332
2333 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
2334 p->mod_fatigue( 1 );
2335 if( vibrator_item.ammo_remaining() > 0 ) {
2336 vibrator_item.ammo_consume( 1, p->pos() );
2337 p->add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, 3, 40 );
2338 if( vibrator_item.ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
2339 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s runs out of batteries." ), vibrator_item.tname() );
2340 }
2341 } else {
2342 //twenty minutes to fill
2343 p->add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, 1, 40 );
2344 }
2345 }
2346 // Dead Tired: different kind of relaxation needed
2347 if( p->get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::dead_tired ) {
2348 act->moves_left = 0;
2349 add_msg( m_info, _( "You're too tired to continue." ) );
2350 }
2351
2352 // Vibrator requires that you be able to move around, stretch, etc, so doesn't play
2353 // well with roots. Sorry. :-(
2354}
2355
2356void activity_handlers::start_engines_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2357{
2358 act->set_to_null();
2359 // Find the vehicle by looking for a remote vehicle first, then by player relative coordinates
2360 vehicle *veh = g->remoteveh();
2361 if( !veh ) {
2362 const tripoint pos = act->placement + g->u.pos();
2363 veh = veh_pointer_or_null( g->m.veh_at( pos ) );
2364 if( !veh ) {
2365 return;
2366 }
2367 }
2368
2369 int attempted = 0;
2370 int non_muscle_attempted = 0;
2371 int started = 0;
2372 int non_muscle_started = 0;
2373 int non_combustion_started = 0;
2374 const bool take_control = act->values[0];
2375
2376 for( size_t e = 0; e < veh->engines.size(); ++e ) {
2377 if( veh->is_engine_on( e ) ) {
2378 attempted++;
2379 if( !veh->is_engine_type( e, itype_muscle ) &&
2380 !veh->is_engine_type( e, itype_animal ) ) {
2381 non_muscle_attempted++;
2382 }
2383 if( veh->start_engine( e ) ) {
2384 started++;
2385 if( !veh->is_engine_type( e, itype_muscle ) &&
2386 !veh->is_engine_type( e, itype_animal ) ) {
2387 non_muscle_started++;
2388 } else {
2389 non_combustion_started++;
2390 }
2391 }
2392 }
2393 }
2394
2395 //Did any engines start?
2396 veh->engine_on = started;
2397 //init working engine noise
2398 sfx::do_vehicle_engine_sfx();
2399
2400 if( attempted == 0 ) {
2401 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s doesn't have an engine!" ), veh->name );
2402 } else if( non_muscle_attempted > 0 ) {
2403 //Some non-muscle engines tried to start
2404 if( non_muscle_attempted == non_muscle_started ) {
2405 //All of the non-muscle engines started
2406 add_msg( vgettext( "The %s's engine starts up.",
2407 "The %s's engines start up.", non_muscle_started ), veh->name );
2408 } else if( non_muscle_started > 0 ) {
2409 //Only some of the non-muscle engines started
2410 add_msg( vgettext( "One of the %s's engines start up.",
2411 "Some of the %s's engines start up.", non_muscle_started ), veh->name );
2412 } else if( non_combustion_started > 0 ) {
2413 //Non-combustions "engines" started
2414 add_msg( _( "The %s is ready for movement." ), veh->name );
2415 } else {
2416 //All of the non-muscle engines failed
2417 add_msg( m_bad, vgettext( "The %s's engine fails to start.",
2418 "The %s's engines fail to start.", non_muscle_attempted ), veh->name );
2419 }
2420 }
2421
2422 if( take_control && !veh->engine_on && !veh->velocity ) {
2423 p->controlling_vehicle = false;
2424 add_msg( _( "You let go of the controls." ) );
2425 }
2426}
2427
2428void activity_handlers::oxytorch_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
2429{
2430 if( act->values[0] <= 0 ) {
2431 return;
2432 }
2433
2434 item &it = *act->targets.front();
2435 // act->values[0] is the number of charges yet to be consumed
2436 const int charges_used = std::min( act->values[0], it.ammo_required() );
2437
2438 it.ammo_consume( charges_used, p->pos() );
2439 act->values[0] -= static_cast<int>( charges_used );
2440
2441 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "oxytorch", sfx::get_heard_volume( act->placement ) );
2442 if( calendar::once_every( 2_turns ) ) {
2443 sounds::sound( act->placement, 10, sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity, _( "hissssssssss!" ) );
2444 }
2445}
2446
2447void activity_handlers::oxytorch_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2448{
2449 act->set_to_null();
2450 const tripoint &pos = act->placement;
2451 const ter_id ter = g->m.ter( pos );
2452
2453 // fast players might still have some charges left to be consumed
2454 act->targets.front()->ammo_consume( act->values[0], p->pos() );
2455
2456 if( g->m.furn( pos ) == f_rack ) {
2457 g->m.furn_set( pos, f_null );
2458 g->m.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_steel_chunk, rng( 2, 6 ) );
2459 } else if( ter == t_chainfence || ter == t_chaingate_c || ter == t_chaingate_l ) {
2460 g->m.ter_set( pos, t_dirt );
2461 g->m.spawn_item( pos, itype_pipe, rng( 1, 4 ) );
2462 g->m.spawn_item( pos, itype_wire, rng( 4, 16 ) );
2463 } else if( ter == t_chainfence_posts ) {
2464 g->m.ter_set( pos, t_dirt );
2465 g->m.spawn_item( pos, itype_pipe, rng( 1, 4 ) );
2466 } else if( ter == t_door_metal_locked || ter == t_door_metal_c || ter == t_door_bar_c ||
2467 ter == t_door_bar_locked || ter == t_door_metal_pickable ) {
2468 g->m.ter_set( pos, t_mdoor_frame );
2469 g->m.spawn_item( pos, itype_steel_plate, rng( 0, 1 ) );
2470 g->m.spawn_item( pos, itype_steel_chunk, rng( 3, 8 ) );
2471 } else if( ter == t_window_enhanced || ter == t_window_enhanced_noglass ) {
2472 g->m.ter_set( pos, t_window_empty );
2473 g->m.spawn_item( pos, itype_steel_plate, rng( 0, 1 ) );
2474 g->m.spawn_item( pos, itype_sheet_metal, rng( 1, 3 ) );
2475 } else if( ter == t_reb_cage ) {
2476 g->m.ter_set( pos, t_pit );
2477 g->m.spawn_item( pos, itype_spike, rng( 1, 19 ) );
2478 g->m.spawn_item( pos, itype_scrap, rng( 1, 8 ) );
2479 } else if( ter == t_bars ) {
2480 if( g->m.ter( pos + point_east ) == t_sewage || g->m.ter( pos + point_south ) ==
2481 t_sewage ||
2482 g->m.ter( pos + point_west ) == t_sewage || g->m.ter( pos + point_north ) ==
2483 t_sewage ) {
2484 g->m.ter_set( pos, t_sewage );
2485 g->m.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, rng( 1, 2 ) );
2486 } else {
2487 g->m.ter_set( pos, t_floor );
2488 g->m.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, rng( 1, 2 ) );
2489 }
2490 } else if( ter == t_window_bars_alarm ) {
2491 g->m.ter_set( pos, t_window_alarm );
2492 g->m.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, rng( 1, 2 ) );
2493 } else if( ter == t_window_bars ) {
2494 g->m.ter_set( pos, t_window_empty );
2495 g->m.spawn_item( p->pos(), itype_pipe, rng( 1, 2 ) );
2496 }
2497}

2499void activity_handlers::cracking_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2500{

2505
2506void activity_handlers::lockpicking_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2507{
2508 item_location &loc = act->targets[ 0 ];
2509 item *it = loc.get_item();
2510 if( it == nullptr ) {
2511 debugmsg( "lockpick item location lost" );
2512 return;
2513 }
2514
2515 const ter_id ter_type = g->m.ter( act->placement );
2516 const furn_id furn_type = g->m.furn( act->placement );
2517 lockpicking_open_result lr = get_lockpicking_open_result( ter_type, furn_type );
2518 ter_id new_ter_type = lr.new_ter_type;
2519 furn_id new_furn_type = lr.new_furn_type;
2520 std::string open_message = lr.open_message;
2521
2522 if( new_ter_type == t_null && new_furn_type == f_null ) {
2523 act->set_to_null();
2524 }
2525
2526 bool destroy = false;
2527
2528 /** @EFFECT_DEX improves chances of successfully picking door lock, reduces chances of bad outcomes */
2529 /** @EFFECT_MECHANICS improves chances of successfully picking door lock, reduces chances of bad outcomes */
2530 int pick_roll = 5 *
2531 ( std::pow( 1.3, p->get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) ) +
2532 it->get_quality( qual_LOCKPICK ) - it->damage() / 2000.0 ) +
2533 p->dex_cur / 4.0;
2534 int lock_roll = rng( 1, 120 );
2535 if( pick_roll >= lock_roll ) {
2536 g->m.has_furn( act->placement ) ?
2537 g->m.furn_set( act->placement, new_furn_type ) :
2538 static_cast<void>( g->m.ter_set( act->placement, new_ter_type ) );
2539 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, open_message );
2540 } else if( furn_type == f_gunsafe_ml && lock_roll > ( 3 * pick_roll ) ) {
2541 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your clumsy attempt jams the lock!" ) );
2542 g->m.furn_set( act->placement, furn_str_id( "f_gunsafe_mj" ) );
2543 } else if( lock_roll > ( 1.5 * pick_roll ) ) {
2544 if( it->inc_damage() ) {
2545 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
2546 _( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it, and you destroy your tool." ) );
2547 destroy = true;
2548 } else {
2549 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
2550 _( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it, and you damage your tool." ) );
2551 }
2552 } else {
2553 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it." ) );
2554 }
2555 if( ter_type == t_door_locked_alarm && ( lock_roll + dice( 1, 30 ) ) > pick_roll ) {
2556 sounds::sound( p->pos(), 40, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "an alarm sound!" ), true, "environment",
2557 "alarm" );
2558 if( !g->timed_events.queued( TIMED_EVENT_WANTED ) ) {
2559 g->timed_events.add( TIMED_EVENT_WANTED, calendar::turn + 30_minutes, 0,
2560 p->global_sm_location() );
2561 }
2562 }
2563 if( destroy ) {
2564 p->i_rem( it );
2565 }
2566
2567 act->set_to_null();
2568}
