2571// TODO (https://github.com/cataclysmbnteam/Cataclysm-BN/issues/1612):
2572// Remove that repair code after repair_activity_actor.
2573
2574enum repeat_type : int {
2575 // REPEAT_INIT should be zero. In some scenarios (veh welder), activity value default to zero.
2576 REPEAT_INIT = 0, // Haven't found repeat value yet.
2577 REPEAT_ONCE, // Repeat just once
2578 REPEAT_FOREVER, // Repeat for as long as possible
2579 REPEAT_FULL, // Repeat until damage==0
2580 REPEAT_EVENT, // Repeat until something interesting happens
2581 REPEAT_CANCEL, // Stop repeating
2582};
2583
2584static repeat_type repeat_menu( const std::string &title, repeat_type last_selection )
2585{
2586 uilist rmenu;
2587 rmenu.text = title;
2588
2589 rmenu.addentry( REPEAT_ONCE, true, '1', _( "Repeat once" ) );
2590 rmenu.addentry( REPEAT_FOREVER, true, '2', _( "Repeat until reinforced" ) );
2591 rmenu.addentry( REPEAT_FULL, true, '3', _( "Repeat until fully repaired, but don't reinforce" ) );
2592 rmenu.addentry( REPEAT_EVENT, true, '4', _( "Repeat until success/failure/level up" ) );
2593 rmenu.addentry( REPEAT_INIT, true, '5', _( "Back to item selection" ) );
2594
2595 rmenu.selected = last_selection - REPEAT_ONCE;
2596 rmenu.query();
2597
2598 if( rmenu.ret >= REPEAT_INIT && rmenu.ret <= REPEAT_EVENT ) {
2599 return static_cast<repeat_type>( rmenu.ret );
2600 }
2601
2602 return REPEAT_CANCEL;
2603}
2604
2605namespace activity_handlers
2606{
2607namespace repair_activity_hack
2608{
2609
2610// Total idea is that:
2611// 1. Modify activity to make sure that repair action wouldn't search item in inventory.
2612// 2. Put coords of interesting vehicle part or furniture.
2613// 3. Before applying each stage of repair, search for possible fake item.
2614//
2615// This relies on fact that repairing with real tools
2616// never use `player_activity::coords`
2617// and use `player::activity::values` with only one item.
2618
2619namespace
2620{
2621enum class hack_type_t : int {
2622 vehicle_weldrig = 0,
2623 furniture = 1
2624};
2625
2626cata::optional<hack_type_t> get_hack_type( const player_activity &activity )
2627{
2628 // Uses real tool
2629 if( activity.values.size() < 2 ) {
2630 return cata::nullopt;
2631 }
2632 assert( !activity.coords.empty() );
2633 // Old save data, probably
2634 if( activity.values.size() == 2 ) {
2635 return hack_type_t::vehicle_weldrig;
2636 }
2637 return static_cast<hack_type_t>( activity.values[2] );
2638}
2639
2640tripoint get_position( const player_activity &activity )
2641{
2642 return activity.coords.at( 0 );
2643}
2644
2645item get_fake_tool( hack_type_t hack_type, const player_activity &activity )
2646{
2647 const tripoint position = get_position( activity );
2648 const map &m = get_map();
2649
2650 item fake_item;
2651
2652 switch( hack_type ) {
2653 case hack_type_t::vehicle_weldrig: {
2654 const optional_vpart_position pos = m.veh_at( position );
2655 if( !pos ) {
2656 debugmsg( "Failed to find vehicle while using it for repair at %s", position.to_string() );
2657 return fake_item;
2658 }
2659 const vehicle &veh = pos->vehicle();
2660
2661 fake_item = item( itype_welder, calendar::turn, 0 );
2662 fake_item.charges = veh.fuel_left( itype_battery );
2663
2664 break;
2665 }
2666 case hack_type_t::furniture: {
2667 if( !m.has_furn( position ) ) {
2668 debugmsg( "Failed to find furniture while using it for repair at %s", position.to_string() );
2669 // Return nullitem in that case
2670 return fake_item;
2671 }
2672 const furn_t &furniture = m.furn( position ).obj();
2673 const itype *item_type = furniture.crafting_pseudo_item_type();
2674 if( item_type == nullptr ) {
2675 return fake_item;
2676 }
2677 if( !item_type->has_flag( "USES_GRID_POWER" ) ) {
2678 debugmsg( "Non grid powered furniture for long repairs is not supported yet." );
2679 return fake_item;
2680 }
2681
2682 const tripoint_abs_ms abspos( m.getabs( position ) );
2683 const distribution_grid &grid = get_distribution_grid_tracker().grid_at( abspos );
2684
2685 fake_item = item( item_type, calendar::turn, 0 );
2686 fake_item.charges = grid.get_resource( true );
2687 break;
2688 }
2689 }
2690
2691 fake_item.set_flag( "PSEUDO" );
2692 return fake_item;
2693}
2694
2695void discharge_real_power_source(
2696 hack_type_t hack_type,
2697 const tripoint &position,
2698 item &tool,
2699 const int original_charges
2700)
2701{
2702 const int used_charges = original_charges - tool.charges;
2703
2704 if( used_charges <= 0 ) {
2705 return;
2706 }
2707
2708 const map &m = get_map();
2709
2710 int unfulfilled_demand = 0;
2711 switch( hack_type ) {
2712 case hack_type_t::vehicle_weldrig: {
2713 optional_vpart_position pos = m.veh_at( position );
2714 if( !pos ) {
2715 return;
2716 }
2717 vehicle &veh = pos->vehicle();
2718 unfulfilled_demand = veh.discharge_battery( used_charges );
2719 break;
2720 }
2721 case hack_type_t::furniture: {
2722 const tripoint_abs_ms abspos( m.getabs( position ) );
2723 distribution_grid &grid = get_distribution_grid_tracker().grid_at( abspos );
2724 unfulfilled_demand = grid.mod_resource( -used_charges );
2725 break;
2726 }
2727 }
2728 if( unfulfilled_demand != 0 ) {
2729 debugmsg(
2730 "Fake tool discharged grid/veh more than grid/veh had! Unfulfilled demand %d kJ",
2731 unfulfilled_demand
2732 );
2733 }
2734}
2735
2736} // namespace
2737
2738void patch_activity_for_vehicle_welder(
2739 player_activity &activity,
2740 const tripoint &veh_part_position,
2741 const vehicle &veh,
2742 int interact_part_idx )
2743{
2744 // Player may start another activity on welder/soldering iron
2745 // Check it here instead of vehicle interaction code
2746 // because we want to encapsulate hack here.
2747 if( activity.id() != ACT_REPAIR_ITEM ) {
2748 return;
2749 }
2750
2751 const int welding_rig_index = veh.part_with_feature( interact_part_idx, "WELDRIG", true );
2752
2753 // This tells activity, that real item doesn't exists in inventory.
2754 activity.index = INT_MIN;
2755 // Data for lookup vehicle part
2756 activity.coords = { veh_part_position };
2757 activity.values = {
2758 // Because we called only on start of repair
2759 static_cast<int>( repeat_type::REPEAT_INIT ),
2760 welding_rig_index,
2761 static_cast<int>( hack_type_t::vehicle_weldrig )
2762 };
2763}
2764
2765void patch_activity_for_furniture( player_activity &activity,
2766 const tripoint &furniture_position )
2767{
2768 // Player may start another activity on welder/soldering iron
2769 // Check it here instead of furniture interaction code
2770 // because we want to encapsulate hack here.
2771 if( activity.id() != ACT_REPAIR_ITEM ) {
2772 return;
2773 }
2774
2775 // This tells activity, that real item doesn't exists in inventory.
2776 activity.index = INT_MIN;
2777 // Data for lookup furniture
2778 activity.coords = { furniture_position };
2779 activity.values = {
2780 // Because we called only on start of repair
2781 static_cast<int>( repeat_type::REPEAT_INIT ),
2782 0, // Useless for us, set only to be compatible with vehicle
2783 static_cast<int>( hack_type_t::furniture )
2784 };
2785}
2786
2787} // namespace repair_activity_hack
2788} // namespace activity_handlers
2789
2790void activity_handlers::repair_item_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2791{
2792 namespace hack = activity_handlers::repair_activity_hack;
2793
2794 const std::string iuse_name_string = act->get_str_value( 0, "repair_item" );
2795 repeat_type repeat = static_cast<repeat_type>( act->get_value( 0, REPEAT_INIT ) );
2796 item_location *ploc = nullptr;
2797 if( !act->targets.empty() ) {
2798 ploc = &act->targets[0];
2799 }
2800
2801 // nullopt if used real tool
2802 cata::optional<hack::hack_type_t> hack_type = hack::get_hack_type( *act );
2803 cata::optional<item> fake_tool = cata::nullopt;
2804 if( hack_type ) {
2805 fake_tool = hack::get_fake_tool( hack_type.value(), *act );
2806 }
2807 const tripoint hack_position = hack_type ? hack::get_position( *act ) : tripoint{};
2808 const int hack_original_charges = fake_tool ? fake_tool->charges : 0;
2809
2810 item *main_tool = nullptr;
2811 if( hack_type.has_value() ) {
2812 main_tool = &fake_tool.value();
2813 }
2814 if( main_tool == nullptr && ploc ) {
2815 main_tool = & **ploc;
2816 }
2817 if( main_tool == nullptr ) {
2818 main_tool = &p->i_at( act->index );
2819 }
2820 if( main_tool == nullptr ) {
2821 debugmsg( "Failed to get main_tool for long repair" );
2822 act->set_to_null();
2823 return;
2824 }
2825
2826 item *used_tool = main_tool->get_usable_item( iuse_name_string );
2827 if( used_tool == nullptr ) {
2828 debugmsg( "Lost tool used for long repair" );
2829 act->set_to_null();
2830 return;
2831 }
2832
2833 const use_function *use_fun = used_tool->get_use( iuse_name_string );
2834 // TODO: De-uglify this block. Something like get_use<iuse_actor_type>() maybe?
2835 const repair_item_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const repair_item_actor *>
2836 ( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
2837 if( actor == nullptr ) {
2838 debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" );
2839 act->set_to_null();
2840 return;
2841 }
2842
2843 // Valid Repeat choice and target, attempt repair.
2844 if( repeat != REPEAT_INIT && act->targets.size() >= 2 ) {
2845 item_location &fix_location = act->targets[1];
2846
2847 // Remember our level: we want to stop retrying on level up
2848 const int old_level = p->get_skill_level( actor->used_skill );
2849 const repair_item_actor::attempt_hint attempt = actor->repair( *p, *used_tool, fix_location );
2850 if( attempt != repair_item_actor::AS_CANT ) {
2851 if( ploc && ploc->where() == item_location::type::map ) {
2852 used_tool->ammo_consume( used_tool->ammo_required(), ploc->position() );
2853 } else {
2854 p->consume_charges( *used_tool, used_tool->ammo_required() );
2855 }
2856 if( hack_type.has_value() ) {
2857 hack::discharge_real_power_source(
2858 hack_type.value(),
2859 hack_position,
2860 *used_tool,
2861 hack_original_charges
2862 );
2863 }
2864 }
2865
2866 // TODO: Allow setting this in the actor
2867 // TODO: Don't use charges_to_use: welder has 50 charges per use, soldering iron has 1
2868 if( !used_tool->units_sufficient( *p ) ) {
2869 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Your %s ran out of charges" ), used_tool->tname() );
2870 act->set_to_null();
2871 return;
2872 }
2873
2874 // Print message explaining why we stopped
2875 // But only if we didn't destroy the item (because then it's obvious)
2876 const bool destroyed = attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_DESTROYED;
2877 const bool cannot_continue_repair = attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_CANT ||
2878 destroyed || !actor->can_repair_target( *p, *fix_location, !destroyed );
2879 if( cannot_continue_repair ) {
2880 // Cannot continue to repair target, select another target.
2881 // **Warning**: as soon as the item is popped back, it is destroyed and can't be used anymore!
2882 act->targets.pop_back();
2883 }
2884
2885 const bool event_happened = attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_FAILURE ||
2886 attempt == repair_item_actor::AS_SUCCESS ||
2887 old_level != p->get_skill_level( actor->used_skill );
2888
2889 const bool need_input =
2890 ( repeat == REPEAT_ONCE ) ||
2891 ( repeat == REPEAT_EVENT && event_happened ) ||
2892 ( repeat == REPEAT_FULL && ( cannot_continue_repair || fix_location->damage() <= 0 ) );
2893 if( need_input ) {
2894 repeat = REPEAT_INIT;
2895 }
2896 }
2897
2898 // Check tool is valid before we query target and Repeat choice.
2899 if( !actor->can_use_tool( *p, *used_tool, true ) ) {
2900 act->set_to_null();
2901 return;
2902 }
2903
2904 // target selection and validation.
2905 while( act->targets.size() < 2 ) {
2906 item_location item_loc = game_menus::inv::repair( *p, actor, main_tool );
2907
2908 if( item_loc == item_location::nowhere ) {
2909 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
2910 act->set_to_null();
2911 return;
2912 }
2913 if( actor->can_repair_target( *p, *item_loc, true ) ) {
2914 act->targets.emplace_back( item_loc );
2915 repeat = REPEAT_INIT;
2916 }
2917 }
2918
2919 const item &fix = *act->targets[1];
2920
2921 if( repeat == REPEAT_INIT ) {
2922 const int level = p->get_skill_level( actor->used_skill );
2923 repair_item_actor::repair_type action_type = actor->default_action( fix, level );
2924 if( action_type == repair_item_actor::RT_NOTHING ) {
2925 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You won't learn anything more by doing that." ) );
2926 }
2927
2928 const std::pair<float, float> chance = actor->repair_chance( *p, fix, action_type );
2929 if( chance.first <= 0.0f ) {
2930 action_type = repair_item_actor::RT_PRACTICE;
2931 }
2932
2933 std::string title = string_format( _( "%s %s\n" ),
2934 repair_item_actor::action_description( action_type ),
2935 fix.tname() );
2936 title += string_format( _( "Charges: <color_light_blue>%s/%s</color> %s (%s per use)\n" ),
2937 used_tool->ammo_remaining(), used_tool->ammo_capacity(),
2938 item::nname( used_tool->ammo_current() ),
2939 used_tool->ammo_required() );
2940 title += string_format( _( "Skill used: <color_light_blue>%s (%s)</color>\n" ),
2941 actor->used_skill.obj().name(), level );
2942 title += string_format( _( "Success chance: <color_light_blue>%.1f</color>%%\n" ),
2943 100.0f * chance.first );
2944 title += string_format( _( "Damage chance: <color_light_blue>%.1f</color>%%" ),
2945 100.0f * chance.second );
2946
2947 if( act->values.empty() ) {
2948 act->values.resize( 1 );
2949 }
2950 do {
2951 repeat = repeat_menu( title, repeat );
2952
2953 if( repeat == REPEAT_CANCEL ) {
2954 act->set_to_null();
2955 return;
2956 }
2957 act->values[0] = static_cast<int>( repeat );
2958 // BACK selected, redo target selection next.
2959 if( repeat == REPEAT_INIT ) {
2960 p->activity.targets.pop_back();
2961 return;
2962 }
2963 if( repeat == REPEAT_FULL && fix.damage() <= 0 ) {
2964 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Your %s is already fully repaired." ), fix.tname() );
2965 repeat = REPEAT_INIT;
2966 }
2967 } while( repeat == REPEAT_INIT );
2968 }
2969
2970 // Otherwise keep retrying
2971 act->moves_left = actor->move_cost;
2972}
2973
2974void activity_handlers::mend_item_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
2975{
2976 act->set_to_null();
2977 if( act->targets.size() != 1 ) {
2978 debugmsg( "invalid arguments to ACT_MEND_ITEM" );
2979 return;
2980 }
2981
2982 item_location &target = act->targets[ 0 ];
2983
2984 const auto f = target->faults.find( fault_id( act->name ) );
2985 if( f == target->faults.end() ) {
2986 debugmsg( "item %s does not have fault %s", target->tname(), act->name );
2987 return;
2988 }
2989
2990 if( act->str_values.empty() ) {
2991 debugmsg( "missing mending_method id for ACT_MEND_ITEM." );
2992 return;
2993 }
2994
2995 const mending_method *method = fault_id( act->name )->find_mending_method( act->str_values[0] );
2996 if( !method ) {
2997 debugmsg( "invalid mending_method id for ACT_MEND_ITEM." );
2998 return;
2999 }
3000
3001 const inventory inv = p->crafting_inventory();
3002 const requirement_data &reqs = method->requirements.obj();
3003 if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component ) ) {
3004 add_msg( m_info, _( "You are currently unable to mend the %s." ), target->tname() );
3005 }
3006 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
3007 p->consume_items( e );
3008 }
3009 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
3010 p->consume_tools( e );
3011 }
3012 p->invalidate_crafting_inventory();
3013
3014 target->faults.erase( *f );
3015 if( method->turns_into ) {
3016 target->faults.emplace( *method->turns_into );
3017 }
3018 // also_mends removes not just the fault picked to be mended, but this as well.
3019 if( method->also_mends ) {
3020 target->faults.erase( *method->also_mends );
3021 }
3022 if( act->name == "fault_gun_blackpowder" || act->name == "fault_gun_dirt" ) {
3023 target->set_var( "dirt", 0 );
3024 }
3025 add_msg( m_good, method->success_msg.translated(), target->tname() );
3026}
3027
3028void activity_handlers::gunmod_add_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3029{
3030 act->set_to_null();
3031 // first unpack all of our arguments
3032 if( act->values.size() != 4 ) {
3033 debugmsg( "Insufficient arguments to ACT_GUNMOD_ADD" );
3034 return;
3035 }
3036
3037 item &gun = *act->targets.at( 0 );
3038 item &mod = *act->targets.at( 1 );
3039
3040 // chance of success (%)
3041 const int roll = act->values[1];
3042 // chance of damage (%)
3043 const int risk = act->values[2];
3044
3045 // any tool charges used during installation
3046 const itype_id tool( act->name );
3047 const int qty = act->values[3];
3048
3049 if( !gun.is_gunmod_compatible( mod ).success() ) {
3050 debugmsg( "Invalid arguments in ACT_GUNMOD_ADD" );
3051 return;
3052 }
3053
3054 if( !tool.is_empty() && qty > 0 ) {
3055 p->use_charges( tool, qty );
3056 }
3057
3058 if( rng( 0, 100 ) <= roll ) {
3059 add_msg( m_good, _( "You successfully attached the %1$s to your %2$s." ), mod.tname(),
3060 gun.tname() );
3061 gun.put_in( p->i_rem( &mod ) );
3062
3063 } else if( rng( 0, 100 ) <= risk ) {
3064 if( gun.inc_damage() ) {
3065 // Remove irremovable mods prior to destroying the gun
3066 for( item *mod : gun.gunmods() ) {
3067 if( mod->is_irremovable() ) {
3068 p->remove_item( *mod );
3069 }
3070 }
3071 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You failed at installing the %s and destroyed your %s!" ), mod.tname(),
3072 gun.tname() );
3073 p->i_rem( &gun );
3074 } else {
3075 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You failed at installing the %s and damaged your %s!" ), mod.tname(),
3076 gun.tname() );
3077 }
3078
3079 } else {
3080 add_msg( m_info, _( "You failed at installing the %s." ), mod.tname() );
3081 }
3082}

3084void activity_handlers::toolmod_add_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3085{
3086 act->set_to_null();
3087 if( act->targets.size() != 2 || !act->targets[0] || !act->targets[1] ) {
3088 debugmsg( "Incompatible arguments to ACT_TOOLMOD_ADD" );
3089 return;
3090 }
3091 item &tool = *act->targets[0];
3092 item &mod = *act->targets[1];
3093 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You successfully attached the %1$s to your %2$s." ),
3094 mod.tname(), tool.tname() );
3095 mod.set_flag( "IRREMOVABLE" );
3096 tool.put_in( mod );
3097 act->targets[1].remove_item();
3098}

3154void activity_handlers::travel_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3155{
3156 if( !p->omt_path.empty() ) {
3157 p->omt_path.pop_back();
3158 if( p->omt_path.empty() ) {
3159 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have reached your destination." ) );
3160 act->set_to_null();
3161 return;
3162 }
3163 const tripoint_abs_omt next_omt = p->omt_path.back();
3164 tripoint_abs_ms waypoint;
3165 if( p->omt_path.size() == 1 ) {
3166 // if next omt is the final one, target its midpoint
3167 waypoint = midpoint( project_bounds<coords::ms>( next_omt ) );
3168 } else {
3169 // otherwise target the middle of the edge nearest to our current location
3170 const tripoint_abs_ms cur_omt_mid = midpoint( project_bounds<coords::ms>
3171 ( p->global_omt_location() ) );
3172 waypoint = clamp( cur_omt_mid, project_bounds<coords::ms>( next_omt ) );
3173 }
3174 map &here = get_map();
3175 // TODO: fix point types
3176 tripoint centre_sub = here.getlocal( waypoint.raw() );
3177 if( !here.passable( centre_sub ) ) {
3178 tripoint_range<tripoint> candidates = here.points_in_radius( centre_sub, 2 );
3179 for( const tripoint &elem : candidates ) {
3180 if( g->m.passable( elem ) ) {
3181 centre_sub = elem;
3182 break;
3183 }
3184 }
3185 }
3186 const std::vector<tripoint> route_to = g->m.route( p->pos(), centre_sub,
3187 p->get_pathfinding_settings(),
3188 p->get_path_avoid() );
3189 if( !route_to.empty() ) {
3190 const activity_id act_travel = ACT_TRAVELLING;
3191 p->set_destination( route_to, player_activity( act_travel ) );
3192 } else {
3193 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot reach that destination" ) );
3194 }
3195 } else {
3196 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have reached your destination." ) );
3197 }
3198 act->set_to_null();
3199}

3212// fish-with-rod fish catching function.
3213static void rod_fish( player *p, const std::vector<monster *> &fishables )
3214{
3215 //if the vector is empty (no fish around) the player is still given a small chance to get a (let us say it was hidden) fish
3216 if( fishables.empty() ) {
3217 const std::vector<mtype_id> fish_group = MonsterGroupManager::GetMonstersFromGroup(
3218 mongroup_id( "GROUP_FISH" ) );
3219 const mtype_id fish_mon = random_entry_ref( fish_group );
3220 g->m.add_item_or_charges( p->pos(), item::make_corpse( fish_mon, calendar::turn + rng( 0_turns,
3221 3_hours ) ) );
3222 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You caught a %s." ), fish_mon.obj().nname() );
3223 } else {
3224 monster *chosen_fish = random_entry( fishables );
3225 chosen_fish->fish_population -= 1;
3226 if( chosen_fish->fish_population <= 0 ) {
3227 g->catch_a_monster( chosen_fish, p->pos(), p, 50_hours );
3228 } else {
3229 g->m.add_item_or_charges( p->pos(), item::make_corpse( chosen_fish->type->id,
3230 calendar::turn + rng( 0_turns,
3231 3_hours ) ) );
3232 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You caught a %s." ), chosen_fish->type->nname() );
3233 }
3234 }
3235 for( item &elem : g->m.i_at( p->pos() ) ) {
3236 if( elem.is_corpse() && !elem.has_var( "activity_var" ) ) {
3237 elem.set_var( "activity_var", p->name );
3238 }
3239 }
3240}
3241
3242void activity_handlers::fish_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3243{
3244 item &it = *act->targets.front();
3245 int fish_chance = 1;
3246 int survival_skill = p->get_skill_level( skill_survival );
3247 if( it.has_flag( flag_FISH_POOR ) ) {
3248 survival_skill += dice( 1, 6 );
3249 } else if( it.has_flag( flag_FISH_GOOD ) ) {
3250 // Much better chances with a good fishing implement.
3251 survival_skill += dice( 4, 9 );
3252 survival_skill *= 2;
3253 }
3254 std::vector<monster *> fishables = g->get_fishable_monsters( act->coord_set );
3255 // Fish are always there, even if it dosnt seem like they are visible!
3256 if( fishables.empty() ) {
3257 fish_chance += survival_skill / 2;
3258 } else {
3259 // if they are visible however, it implies a larger population
3260 for( monster *elem : fishables ) {
3261 fish_chance += elem->fish_population;
3262 }
3263 fish_chance += survival_skill;
3264 }
3265 // no matter the population of fish, your skill and tool limits the ease of catching.
3266 fish_chance = std::min( survival_skill * 10, fish_chance );
3267 if( x_in_y( fish_chance, 600000 ) ) {
3268 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You feel a tug on your line!" ) );
3269 rod_fish( p, fishables );
3270 }
3271 if( calendar::once_every( 60_minutes ) ) {
3272 p->practice( skill_survival, rng( 1, 3 ) );
3273 }
3274
3275}

3282 p->backlog.clear();

3284 }

3300void activity_handlers::repair_item_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3301{
3302 // Moves are decremented based on a combination of speed and good vision (not in the dark, farsighted, etc)
3303 const int effective_moves = p->moves / p->fine_detail_vision_mod();
3304 if( effective_moves <= act->moves_left ) {
3305 act->moves_left -= effective_moves;
3306 p->moves = 0;
3307 } else {
3308 p->moves -= act->moves_left * p->fine_detail_vision_mod();
3309 act->moves_left = 0;
3310 }

3341void activity_handlers::read_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )

3349 guy->finish_read( act->targets.front() );

3352 u->do_read( act->targets.front() );

3373
3374void activity_handlers::find_mount_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3375{
3376 //npc only activity
3377 if( p->is_player() ) {
3378 act->set_to_null();
3379 return;
3380 }
3381 npc &guy = dynamic_cast<npc &>( *p );
3382 monster *mon = guy.chosen_mount.lock().get();
3383 if( !mon ) {
3384 act->set_to_null();
3385 guy.revert_after_activity();
3386 return;
3387 }
3388 if( rl_dist( guy.pos(), mon->pos() ) <= 1 ) {
3389 if( mon->has_effect( effect_ai_waiting ) ) {
3390 mon->remove_effect( effect_ai_waiting );
3391 }
3392 if( p->can_mount( *mon ) ) {
3393 act->set_to_null();
3394 guy.revert_after_activity();
3395 guy.chosen_mount = weak_ptr_fast<monster>();
3396 p->mount_creature( *mon );
3397 } else {
3398 act->set_to_null();
3399 guy.revert_after_activity();
3400 return;
3401 }
3402 } else {
3403 const std::vector<tripoint> route = route_adjacent( *p, guy.chosen_mount.lock()->pos() );
3404 if( route.empty() ) {
3405 act->set_to_null();
3406 guy.revert_after_activity();
3407 mon->remove_effect( effect_ai_waiting );
3408 return;
3409 } else {
3410 p->activity = player_activity();
3411 mon->add_effect( effect_ai_waiting, 40_turns );
3412 p->set_destination( route, player_activity( ACT_FIND_MOUNT ) );
3413 }
3414 }
3415}

3423void activity_handlers::wait_stamina_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3424{
3425 int stamina_threshold = p->get_stamina_max();
3426 if( !act->values.empty() ) {
3427 stamina_threshold = act->values[0];
3428 // remember initial stamina, only for waiting-with-threshold
3429 if( act->values.size() == 1 ) {
3430 act->values.push_back( p->get_stamina() );
3431 }
3432 }
3433 if( p->get_stamina() >= stamina_threshold ) {
3434 wait_stamina_finish( act, p );
3435 }
3436}
3437
3438void activity_handlers::wait_stamina_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3439{
3440 if( !act->values.empty() ) {
3441 const int stamina_threshold = act->values[0];
3442 const int stamina_initial = ( act->values.size() > 1 ) ? act->values[1] : p->get_stamina();
3443 if( p->get_stamina() < stamina_threshold && p->get_stamina() <= stamina_initial ) {
3444 debugmsg( "Failed to wait until stamina threshold %d reached, only at %d. You may not be regaining stamina.",
3445 act->values.front(), p->get_stamina() );
3446 }
3447 } else if( p->get_stamina() < p->get_stamina_max() ) {
3448 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You are bored of waiting, so you stop." ) );
3449 } else {
3450 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish waiting and feel refreshed." ) );
3451 }
3452 act->set_to_null();
3453}

3461void activity_handlers::try_sleep_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3462{
3463 if( !p->has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
3464 if( p->can_sleep() ) {
3465 act->set_to_null();
3466 p->fall_asleep();
3467 p->remove_value( "sleep_query" );
3468 } else if( one_in( 1000 ) ) {
3469 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You toss and turn…" ) );
3470 }
3471 if( calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
3472 try_sleep_query( act, p );
3473 }
3474 }
3475}
3476
3477void activity_handlers::try_sleep_query( player_activity *act, player *p )
3478{
3479 if( p->get_value( "sleep_query" ) == "false" ) {
3480 return;
3481 }
3482 uilist sleep_query;
3483 sleep_query.text = _( "You have trouble sleeping, keep trying?" );
3484 sleep_query.addentry( 1, true, 'S', _( "Stop trying to fall asleep and get up." ) );
3485 sleep_query.addentry( 2, true, 'c', _( "Continue trying to fall asleep." ) );
3486 sleep_query.addentry( 3, true, 'C',
3487 _( "Continue trying to fall asleep and don't ask again." ) );
3488 sleep_query.query();
3489 switch( sleep_query.ret ) {
3490 case UILIST_CANCEL:
3491 case 1:
3492 act->set_to_null();
3493 break;
3494 case 3:
3495 p->set_value( "sleep_query", "false" );
3496 break;
3497 case 2:
3498 default:
3499 break;
3500 }
3501}
3502
3503void activity_handlers::operation_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3504{
3505 /**
3506 - values[0]: Difficulty
3507 - values[1]: success
3508 - values[2]: max_power_level
3509 - values[3]: pl_skill
3510 - str_values[0]: install/uninstall
3511 - str_values[1]: bionic_id
3512 - str_values[2]: installer_name
3513 - str_values[3]: bool autodoc
3514 */
3515 enum operation_values_ids {
3516 operation_type = 0,
3517 cbm_id = 1,
3518 installer_name = 2,
3519 is_autodoc = 3
3520 };
3521 const bionic_id bid( act->str_values[cbm_id] );
3522 const bionic_id upbid = bid->upgraded_bionic;
3523 const bool autodoc = act->str_values[is_autodoc] == "true";
3524 const bool u_see = g->u.sees( p->pos() ) && ( !g->u.has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ||
3525 g->u.has_bionic( bio_painkiller ) || g->u.has_trait( trait_NOPAIN ) );
3526
3527 const int difficulty = act->values.front();
3528
3529 const std::vector<bodypart_id> bps = get_occupied_bodyparts( bid );
3530
3531 const time_duration half_op_duration = difficulty * 10_minutes;
3532 const time_duration message_freq = difficulty * 2_minutes;
3533 time_duration time_left = time_duration::from_turns( act->moves_left / 100 );
3534
3535 if( autodoc && g->m.inbounds( p->pos() ) ) {
3536 const std::list<tripoint> autodocs = g->m.find_furnitures_with_flag_in_radius( p->pos(), 1,
3537 flag_AUTODOC );
3538
3539 if( !g->m.has_flag_furn( flag_AUTODOC_COUCH, p->pos() ) || autodocs.empty() ) {
3540 p->remove_effect( effect_under_op );
3541 act->set_to_null();
3542
3543 if( u_see ) {
3544 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The autodoc suffers a catastrophic failure." ) );
3545
3546 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
3547 _( "The Autodoc's failure damages you greatly." ),
3548 _( "The Autodoc's failure damages <npcname> greatly." ) );
3549 }
3550 if( !bps.empty() ) {
3551 for( const bodypart_id &bp : bps ) {
3552 p->add_effect( effect_bleed, 1_hours, bp->token, difficulty );
3553 p->apply_damage( nullptr, bp, 20 * difficulty );
3554
3555 if( u_see ) {
3556 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad, _( "Your %s is ripped open." ),
3557 _( "<npcname>'s %s is ripped open." ), body_part_name_accusative( bp->token ) );
3558 }
3559
3560 if( bp == bodypart_id( "eyes" ) ) {
3561 p->add_effect( effect_blind, 1_hours, num_bp );
3562 }
3563 }
3564 } else {
3565 p->add_effect( effect_bleed, 1_hours, num_bp, difficulty );
3566 p->apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), 20 * difficulty );
3567 }
3568 }
3569 }
3570
3571 if( time_left > half_op_duration ) {
3572 if( !bps.empty() ) {
3573 for( const bodypart_id &bp : bps ) {
3574 if( calendar::once_every( message_freq ) && u_see && autodoc ) {
3575 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
3576 _( "The Autodoc is meticulously cutting your %s open." ),
3577 _( "The Autodoc is meticulously cutting <npcname>'s %s open." ),
3578 body_part_name_accusative( bp->token ) );
3579 }
3580 }
3581 } else {
3582 if( calendar::once_every( message_freq ) && u_see ) {
3583 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
3584 _( "The Autodoc is meticulously cutting you open." ),
3585 _( "The Autodoc is meticulously cutting <npcname> open." ) );
3586 }
3587 }
3588 } else if( time_left == half_op_duration ) {
3589 if( act->str_values[operation_type] == "uninstall" ) {
3590 if( u_see && autodoc ) {
3591 add_msg( m_info, _( "The Autodoc attempts to carefully extract the bionic." ) );
3592 }
3593
3594 if( p->has_bionic( bid ) ) {
3595 p->perform_uninstall( bid, act->values[0], act->values[1],
3596 units::from_joule( act->values[2] ), act->values[3] );
3597 } else {
3598 debugmsg( _( "Tried to uninstall %s, but you don't have this bionic installed." ), bid.c_str() );
3599 p->remove_effect( effect_under_op );
3600 act->set_to_null();
3601 }
3602 } else {
3603 if( u_see && autodoc ) {
3604 add_msg( m_info, _( "The Autodoc attempts to carefully insert the bionic." ) );
3605 }
3606
3607 if( bid.is_valid() ) {
3608 p->perform_install( bid, upbid, act->values[0], act->values[1], act->values[3],
3609 act->str_values[installer_name], bid->canceled_mutations );
3610 } else {
3611 debugmsg( _( "%s is no a valid bionic_id" ), bid.c_str() );
3612 p->remove_effect( effect_under_op );
3613 act->set_to_null();
3614 }
3615 }
3616 } else if( act->values[1] > 0 ) {
3617 if( !bps.empty() ) {
3618 for( const bodypart_id &bp : bps ) {
3619 if( calendar::once_every( message_freq ) && u_see && autodoc ) {
3620 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
3621 _( "The Autodoc is stitching your %s back up." ),
3622 _( "The Autodoc is stitching <npcname>'s %s back up." ),
3623 body_part_name_accusative( bp->token ) );
3624 }
3625 }
3626 } else {
3627 if( calendar::once_every( message_freq ) && u_see && autodoc ) {
3628 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
3629 _( "The Autodoc is stitching you back up." ),
3630 _( "The Autodoc is stitching <npcname> back up." ) );
3631 }
3632 }
3633 } else {
3634 if( calendar::once_every( message_freq ) && u_see && autodoc ) {
3635 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
3636 _( "The Autodoc is moving erratically through the rest of its program, not actually stitching your wounds." ),
3637 _( "The Autodoc is moving erratically through the rest of its program, not actually stitching <npcname>'s wounds." ) );
3638 }
3639 }
3640
3641 // Makes sure NPC is still under anesthesia
3642 if( p->has_effect( effect_narcosis ) ) {
3643 const time_duration remaining_time = p->get_effect_dur( effect_narcosis );
3644 if( remaining_time <= time_left ) {
3645 const time_duration top_off_time = time_left - remaining_time;
3646 p->add_effect( effect_narcosis, top_off_time );
3647 p->add_effect( effect_sleep, top_off_time );
3648 }
3649 } else {
3650 p->add_effect( effect_narcosis, time_left );
3651 p->add_effect( effect_sleep, time_left );
3652 }
3653}

3663void activity_handlers::operation_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3664{
3665 if( act->str_values[3] == "true" ) {
3666 if( act->values[1] > 0 ) {
3667 add_msg( m_good,
3668 _( "The Autodoc returns to its resting position after successfully performing the operation." ) );
3669 const std::list<tripoint> autodocs = g->m.find_furnitures_with_flag_in_radius( p->pos(), 1,
3670 flag_AUTODOC );
3671 sounds::sound( autodocs.front(), 10, sounds::sound_t::music,
3672 _( "a short upbeat jingle: \"Operation successful\"" ), true,
3673 "Autodoc",
3674 "success" );
3675 } else {
3676 if( act->str_values[0] == "install" ) {
3677 add_msg( m_warning,
3678 _( "The Autodoc completes installation and activates bionic but reports about complications during operation." ) );
3679 const std::list<tripoint> autodocs = g->m.find_furnitures_with_flag_in_radius( p->pos(), 1,
3680 flag_AUTODOC );
3681 sounds::sound( autodocs.front(), 10, sounds::sound_t::music,
3682 _( "a sad beeping noise: \"Complications detected! Report to medical personnel immediately!\"" ),
3683 true,
3684 "Autodoc",
3685 "failure" );
3686 } else {
3687 add_msg( m_bad,
3688 _( "The Autodoc jerks back to its resting position after failing the operation." ) );
3689 const std::list<tripoint> autodocs = g->m.find_furnitures_with_flag_in_radius( p->pos(), 1,
3690 flag_AUTODOC );
3691 sounds::sound( autodocs.front(), 10, sounds::sound_t::music,
3692 _( "a sad beeping noise: \"Operation failed\"" ), true,
3693 "Autodoc",
3694 "failure" );
3695 }
3696
3697 }
3698 } else {
3699 if( act->values[1] > 0 ) {
3700 add_msg( m_good,
3701 _( "The operation is a success." ) );
3702 } else {
3703 if( act->str_values[0] == "install" ) {
3704 add_msg( m_warning,
3705 _( "Bionic was installed and activated but a complication happened during operation!" ) );
3706 } else {
3707 add_msg( m_bad,
3708 _( "The operation is a failure." ) );
3709 }
3710
3711 }
3712 }
3713 p->remove_effect( effect_under_op );
3714 act->set_to_null();
3715}

3727void activity_handlers::plant_seed_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
3728{
3729 tripoint examp = g->m.getlocal( act->placement );
3730 const itype_id seed_id( act->str_values[0] );
3731 std::list<item> used_seed;
3732 if( item::count_by_charges( seed_id ) ) {
3733 used_seed = p->use_charges( seed_id, 1 );
3734 } else {
3735 used_seed = p->use_amount( seed_id, 1 );
3736 }
3737 if( !used_seed.empty() ) {
3738 used_seed.front().set_age( 0_turns );
3739 if( used_seed.front().has_var( "activity_var" ) ) {
3740 used_seed.front().erase_var( "activity_var" );
3741 }
3742 used_seed.front().set_flag( flag_HIDDEN_ITEM );
3743 g->m.add_item_or_charges( examp, used_seed.front() );
3744 if( g->m.has_flag_furn( flag_PLANTABLE, examp ) ) {
3745 g->m.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id( g->m.furn( examp )->plant->transform ) );
3746 } else {
3747 g->m.set( examp, t_dirt, f_plant_seed );
3748 }
3749 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "You plant some %s." ), _( "<npcname> plants some %s." ),
3750 item::nname( seed_id ) );
3751 }
3752 // Go back to what we were doing before
3753 // could be player zone activity, or could be NPC multi-farming
3754 act->set_to_null();
3755 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
3756}
3757
3758void activity_handlers::build_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3759{
3760 partial_con *pc = g->m.partial_con_at( g->m.getlocal( act->placement ) );
3761 // Maybe the player and the NPC are working on the same construction at the same time
3762 if( !pc ) {
3763 if( p->is_npc() ) {
3764 // if player completes the work while NPC still in activity loop
3765 p->activity = player_activity();
3766 p->set_moves( 0 );
3767 } else {
3768 p->cancel_activity();
3769 }
3770 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s did not find an unfinished construction at the activity spot." ),
3771 p->disp_name() );
3772 return;
3773 }
3774 // if you ( or NPC ) are finishing someone else's started construction...
3775 const construction &built = pc->id.obj();
3776 if( !p->has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) && !p->meets_skill_requirements( built ) ) {
3777 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s can't work on this construction anymore." ), p->disp_name() );
3778 p->cancel_activity();
3779 if( p->is_npc() ) {
3780 p->activity = player_activity();
3781 p->set_moves( 0 );
3782 }
3783 return;
3784 }
3785 // item_counter represents the percent progress relative to the base batch time
3786 // stored precise to 5 decimal places ( e.g. 67.32 percent would be stored as 6732000 )
3787 const int old_counter = pc->counter;
3788
3789 // Base moves for construction with no speed modifier or assistants
3790 // Must ensure >= 1 so we don't divide by 0;
3791 const double base_total_moves = std::max( 1, built.time );
3792 // Current expected total moves, includes construction speed modifiers and assistants
3793 const double cur_total_moves = std::max( 1, built.adjusted_time() );
3794 // Delta progress in moves adjusted for current crafting speed
3795 const double delta_progress = p->get_moves() * base_total_moves / cur_total_moves;
3796 // Current progress in moves
3797 const double current_progress = old_counter * base_total_moves / 10000000.0 +
3798 delta_progress;
3799 // Current progress as a percent of base_total_moves to 2 decimal places
3800 pc->counter = std::round( current_progress / base_total_moves * 10000000.0 );
3801
3802 p->set_moves( 0 );
3803
3804 pc->counter = std::min( pc->counter, 10000000 );
3805 // If construction_progress has reached 100% or more
3806 if( pc->counter >= 10000000 ) {
3807 // Activity is canceled in complete_construction()
3808 complete_construction( p );
3809 }
3810}

3866
3867void activity_handlers::craft_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
3868{
3869 item *craft = act->targets.front().get_item();
3870
3871 // item_location::get_item() will return nullptr if the item is lost
3872 if( !craft ) {
3873 p->add_msg_player_or_npc(
3874 _( "You no longer have the in progress craft in your possession. "
3875 "You stop crafting. "
3876 "Reactivate the in progress craft to continue crafting." ),
3877 _( "<npcname> no longer has the in progress craft in their possession. "
3878 "<npcname> stops crafting." ) );
3879 p->cancel_activity();
3880 return;
3881 }
3882
3883 if( !craft->is_craft() ) {
3884 debugmsg( "ACT_CRAFT target '%s' is not a craft. Aborting ACT_CRAFT.", craft->tname() );
3885 p->cancel_activity();
3886 return;
3887 }
3888
3889 if( !p->can_continue_craft( *craft ) ) {
3890 p->cancel_activity();
3891 return;
3892 }
3893
3894 const recipe &rec = craft->get_making();
3895 const tripoint bench_pos = act->coords.front();
3896 // Ugly
3897 bench_type bench_t = bench_type( act->values[1] );
3898 const float crafting_speed = crafting_speed_multiplier( *p, *craft, bench_location{bench_t, bench_pos} );
3899 const int assistants = p->available_assistant_count( craft->get_making() );
3900 const bool is_long = act->values[0];
3901
3902 if( crafting_speed <= 0.0f ) {
3903 p->cancel_activity();
3904 return;
3905 }
3906
3907 // item_counter represents the percent progress relative to the base batch time
3908 // stored precise to 5 decimal places ( e.g. 67.32 percent would be stored as 6'732'000 )
3909 const int old_counter = craft->item_counter;
3910
3911 // Base moves for batch size with no speed modifier or assistants
3912 // Must ensure >= 1 so we don't divide by 0;
3913 const double base_total_moves = std::max( 1, rec.batch_time( craft->charges, 1.0f, 0 ) );
3914 // Current expected total moves, includes crafting speed modifiers and assistants
3915 const double cur_total_moves = std::max( 1, rec.batch_time( craft->charges, crafting_speed,
3916 assistants ) );
3917 // Delta progress in moves adjusted for current crafting speed
3918 const double delta_progress = p->get_moves() * base_total_moves / cur_total_moves;
3919 // Current progress in moves
3920 const double current_progress = craft->item_counter * base_total_moves / 10'000'000.0 +
3921 delta_progress;
3922 // Current progress as a percent of base_total_moves to 2 decimal places
3923 craft->item_counter = std::round( current_progress / base_total_moves * 10'000'000.0 );
3924 p->set_moves( 0 );
3925
3926 // This is to ensure we don't over count skill steps
3927 craft->item_counter = std::min( craft->item_counter, 10'000'000 );
3928
3929 // Skill and tools are gained/consumed after every 5% progress
3930 int five_percent_steps = craft->item_counter / 500'000 - old_counter / 500'000;
3931 if( five_percent_steps > 0 ) {
3932 p->craft_skill_gain( *craft, five_percent_steps );
3933 }
3934
3935 // Unlike skill, tools are consumed once at the start and should not be consumed at the end
3936 if( craft->item_counter >= 10'000'000 ) {
3937 --five_percent_steps;
3938 }
3939
3940 if( five_percent_steps > 0 ) {
3941 if( !p->craft_consume_tools( *craft, five_percent_steps, false ) ) {
3942 // So we don't skip over any tool comsuption
3943 craft->item_counter -= craft->item_counter % 500000 + 1;
3944 p->cancel_activity();
3945 return;
3946 }
3947 }
3948
3949 // if item_counter has reached 100% or more
3950 if( craft->item_counter >= 10'000'000 ) {
3951 item craft_copy = *craft;
3952 act->targets.front().remove_item();
3953 p->cancel_activity();
3954 complete_craft( *p, craft_copy, bench_location{bench_t, bench_pos} );
3955 if( is_long ) {
3956 if( p->making_would_work( p->lastrecipe, craft_copy.charges ) ) {
3957 p->last_craft->execute( bench_pos );
3958 }
3959 }
3960 } else if( craft->item_counter >= craft->get_next_failure_point() ) {
3961 bool destroy = craft->handle_craft_failure( *p );
3962 // If the craft needs to be destroyed, do it and stop crafting.
3963 if( destroy ) {
3964 p->add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "There is nothing left of the %s to craft from." ),
3965 _( "There is nothing left of the %s <npcname> was crafting." ), craft->tname() );
3966 act->targets.front().remove_item();
3967 p->cancel_activity();
3968 }
3969 }
3970}

4133
4134void activity_handlers::chop_tree_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4135{
4136 const tripoint &pos = g->m.getlocal( act->placement );
4137
4138 tripoint direction;
4139 if( !p->is_npc() ) {
4140 if( p->backlog.empty() || p->backlog.front().id() != ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_TREES ) {
4141 while( true ) {
4142 if( const cata::optional<tripoint> dir = choose_direction(
4143 _( "Select a direction for the tree to fall in." ) ) ) {
4144 direction = *dir;
4145 break;
4146 }
4147 // try again
4148 }
4149 }
4150 } else {
4151 for( const tripoint &elem : g->m.points_in_radius( pos, 1 ) ) {
4152 bool cantuse = false;
4153 tripoint direc = elem - pos;
4154 tripoint proposed_to = pos + point( 3 * direction.x, 3 * direction.y );
4155 std::vector<tripoint> rough_tree_line = line_to( pos, proposed_to );
4156 for( const tripoint &elem : rough_tree_line ) {
4157 if( g->critter_at( elem ) ) {
4158 cantuse = true;
4159 break;
4160 }
4161 }
4162 if( !cantuse ) {
4163 direction = direc;
4164 }
4165 }
4166 }
4167
4168 const tripoint to = pos + 3 * direction.xy() + point( rng( -1, 1 ), rng( -1, 1 ) );
4169 std::vector<tripoint> tree = line_to( pos, to, rng( 1, 8 ) );
4170 for( const tripoint &elem : tree ) {
4171 g->m.batter( elem, 300, 5 );
4172 g->m.ter_set( elem, t_trunk );
4173 }
4174
4175 g->m.ter_set( pos, t_stump );
4176 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish chopping down a tree." ) );
4177 // sound of falling tree
4178 sfx::play_variant_sound( "misc", "timber",
4179 sfx::get_heard_volume( g->m.getlocal( act->placement ) ) );
4180 act->set_to_null();
4181 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
4182}

4184void activity_handlers::chop_logs_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )

4193 splint_quan = 0;

4195 log_quan = rng( 0, 2 );

4210 obj.set_var( "activity_var", p->name );

4214 item obj( itype_splinter, calendar::turn );

4216 g->m.add_item_or_charges( pos, obj );

4218 g->m.ter_set( pos, t_dirt );
4219 const int helpersize = p->get_crafting_helpers( 3 ).size();
4220 p->mod_stored_nutr( 5 - helpersize );
4221 p->mod_thirst( 5 - helpersize );
4222 p->mod_fatigue( 10 - ( helpersize * 2 ) );

4224

4226 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );

4229void activity_handlers::chop_planks_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4230{
4231 const int max_planks = 10;
4232 /** @EFFECT_FABRICATION increases number of planks cut from a log */
4233 int planks = normal_roll( 2 + p->get_skill_level( skill_id( "fabrication" ) ), 1 );
4234 int wasted_planks = max_planks - planks;
4235 int scraps = rng( wasted_planks, wasted_planks * 3 );
4236 planks = std::min( planks, max_planks );
4237
4238 if( planks > 0 ) {
4239 g->m.spawn_item( g->m.getlocal( act->placement ), itype_2x4, planks, 0, calendar::turn );
4240 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You produce %d planks." ), planks );
4241 }
4242 if( scraps > 0 ) {
4243 g->m.spawn_item( g->m.getlocal( act->placement ), itype_splinter, scraps, 0, calendar::turn );
4244 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You produce %d splinters." ), scraps );
4245 }
4246 if( planks < max_planks / 2 ) {
4247 p->add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You waste a lot of the wood." ) );
4248 }
4249 act->set_to_null();
4250 resume_for_multi_activities( *p );
4251}

4344
4345std::vector<tripoint> get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( const tripoint &abspos,
4346 const std::unordered_set<tripoint> &tiles )
4347{
4348 const auto cmp = [abspos]( tripoint a, tripoint b ) {
4349 const int da = rl_dist( abspos, a );
4350 const int db = rl_dist( abspos, b );
4351
4352 return da < db;
4353 };
4354
4355 std::vector<tripoint> sorted( tiles.begin(), tiles.end() );
4356 std::sort( sorted.begin(), sorted.end(), cmp );
4357
4358 return sorted;
4359}
4360
4361template<typename fn>
4362static void cleanup_tiles( std::unordered_set<tripoint> &tiles, fn &cleanup )
4363{
4364 auto it = tiles.begin();
4365 while( it != tiles.end() ) {
4366 auto current = it++;
4367
4368 const tripoint &tile_loc = g->m.getlocal( *current );
4369
4370 if( cleanup( tile_loc ) ) {
4371 tiles.erase( current );
4372 }
4373 }
4374}
4375
4376static void perform_zone_activity_turn( player *p,
4377 const zone_type_id &ztype,
4378 const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> &tile_filter,
4379 const std::function<void ( player &p, const tripoint & )> &tile_action,
4380 const std::string &finished_msg )
4381{
4382 const zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
4383 const tripoint abspos = g->m.getabs( p->pos() );
4384 std::unordered_set<tripoint> unsorted_tiles = mgr.get_near( ztype, abspos );
4385
4386 cleanup_tiles( unsorted_tiles, tile_filter );
4387
4388 // sort remaining tiles by distance
4389 const std::vector<tripoint> &tiles = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, unsorted_tiles );
4390
4391 for( const tripoint &tile : tiles ) {
4392 const tripoint &tile_loc = g->m.getlocal( tile );
4393
4394 std::vector<tripoint> route = g->m.route( p->pos(), tile_loc, p->get_pathfinding_settings(),
4395 p->get_path_avoid() );
4396 if( route.size() > 1 ) {
4397 route.pop_back();
4398
4399 p->set_destination( route, p->activity );
4400 p->activity.set_to_null();
4401 return;
4402 } else {
4403 // we are at destination already
4404 /* Perform action */
4405 tile_action( *p, tile_loc );
4406 if( p->moves <= 0 ) {
4407 return;
4408 }
4409 }
4410 }
4411 add_msg( m_info, finished_msg );
4412 p->activity.set_to_null();
4413}
4414
4415void activity_handlers::fertilize_plot_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
4416{
4417 itype_id fertilizer;
4418 auto check_fertilizer = [&]( bool ask_user = true ) -> void {
4419 if( act->str_values.empty() )
4420 {
4421 act->str_values.push_back( "" );
4422 }
4423 fertilizer = itype_id( act->str_values[0] );
4424
4425 /* If unspecified, or if we're out of what we used before, ask */
4426 if( ask_user && ( fertilizer.is_empty() || !p->has_charges( fertilizer, 1 ) ) )
4427 {
4428 fertilizer = iexamine::choose_fertilizer( *p, "plant",
4429 false /* Don't confirm action with player */ );
4430 act->str_values[0] = fertilizer.str();
4431 }
4432 };
4433
4434 auto have_fertilizer = [&]() {
4435 return !fertilizer.is_empty() && p->has_charges( fertilizer, 1 );
4436 };
4437
4438 const auto reject_tile = [&]( const tripoint & tile ) {
4439 check_fertilizer();
4440 ret_val<bool> can_fert = iexamine::can_fertilize( *p, tile, fertilizer );
4441 return !can_fert.success();
4442 };
4443
4444 const auto fertilize = [&]( player & p, const tripoint & tile ) {
4445 check_fertilizer();
4446 if( have_fertilizer() ) {
4447 iexamine::fertilize_plant( p, tile, fertilizer );
4448 if( !have_fertilizer() ) {
4449 add_msg( m_info, _( "You have run out of %s." ), item::nname( fertilizer ) );
4450 }
4451 }
4452 };
4453
4454 check_fertilizer();
4455 if( !have_fertilizer() ) {
4456 act->set_to_null();
4457 return;
4458 }
4459
4460 perform_zone_activity_turn( p,
4461 zone_type_FARM_PLOT,
4462 reject_tile,
4463 fertilize,
4464 _( "You fertilized every plot you could." ) );
4465}
4466
4467void activity_handlers::robot_control_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
4468{
4469 if( act->monsters.empty() ) {
4470 debugmsg( "No monster assigned in ACT_ROBOT_CONTROL" );
4471 act->set_to_null();
4472 return;
4473 }
4474 const shared_ptr_fast<monster> z = act->monsters[0].lock();
4475
4476 if( !z || !iuse::robotcontrol_can_target( p, *z ) ) {
4477 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Target lost. IFF override failed." ) );
4478 act->set_to_null();
4479 return;
4480 }
4481
4482 // TODO: Add some kind of chance of getting the target's attention
4483}
4484
4485void activity_handlers::robot_control_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4486{
4487 act->set_to_null();
4488
4489 if( act->monsters.empty() ) {
4490 debugmsg( "No monster assigned in ACT_ROBOT_CONTROL" );
4491 return;
4492 }
4493
4494 shared_ptr_fast<monster> z = act->monsters[0].lock();
4495 act->monsters.clear();
4496
4497 if( !z || !iuse::robotcontrol_can_target( p, *z ) ) {
4498 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "Target lost. IFF override failed." ) );
4499 return;
4500 }
4501
4502 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You unleash your override attack on the %s." ), z->name() );
4503
4504 /** @EFFECT_INT increases chance of successful robot reprogramming, vs difficulty */
4505 /** @EFFECT_COMPUTER increases chance of successful robot reprogramming, vs difficulty */
4506 const int computer_skill = p->get_skill_level( skill_id( "computer" ) );
4507 const float randomized_skill = rng( 2, p->int_cur ) + computer_skill;
4508 float success = computer_skill - 3 * z->type->difficulty / randomized_skill;
4509 if( z->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
4510 success = randomized_skill - rng( 1, 11 );
4511 }
4512 // rideable mechs are not hostile, they have no AI, they do not resist control as much.
4513 if( success >= 0 ) {
4514 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "You successfully override the %s's IFF protocols!" ),
4515 z->name() );
4516 z->friendly = -1;
4517 if( z->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
4518 z->add_effect( effect_pet, 1_turns, num_bp );
4519 }
4520 } else if( success >= -2 ) {
4521 //A near success
4522 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s short circuits as you attempt to reprogram it!" ), z->name() );
4523 //damage it a little
4524 z->apply_damage( p, bodypart_id( "torso" ), rng( 1, 10 ) );
4525 if( z->is_dead() ) {
4526 p->practice( skill_id( "computer" ), 10 );
4527 // Do not do the other effects if the robot died
4528 return;
4529 }
4530 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
4531 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "…and turns friendly!" ) );
4532 //did the robot became friendly permanently?
4533 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
4534 //it did
4535 z->friendly = -1;
4536 } else {
4537 // it didn't
4538 z->friendly = rng( 5, 40 );
4539 }
4540 }
4541 } else {
4542 p->add_msg_if_player( _( "…but the robot refuses to acknowledge you as an ally!" ) );
4543 }
4544 p->practice( skill_computer, 10 );
4545}
4546
4547void activity_handlers::tree_communion_do_turn( player_activity *act, player *p )
4548{
4549 // There's an initial rooting process.
4550 if( act->values.front() > 0 ) {
4551 act->values.front() -= 1;
4552 if( act->values.front() == 0 ) {
4553 if( p->has_trait( trait_id( trait_SPIRITUAL ) ) ) {
4554 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The ancient tree spirits answer your call." ) );
4555 } else {
4556 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Your communion with the trees has begun." ) );
4557 }
4558 }
4559 return;
4560 }
4561 // Information is received every minute.
4562 if( !calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
4563 return;
4564 }
4565 // Breadth-first search forest tiles until one reveals new overmap tiles.
4566 std::queue<tripoint_abs_omt> q;
4567 std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_omt> seen;
4568 tripoint_abs_omt loc = p->global_omt_location();
4569 q.push( loc );
4570 seen.insert( loc );
4571 const std::function<bool( const oter_id & )> filter = []( const oter_id & ter ) {
4572 return ter.obj().is_wooded() || ter.obj().get_name() == "field";
4573 };
4574 while( !q.empty() ) {
4575 tripoint_abs_omt tpt = q.front();
4576 if( overmap_buffer.reveal( tpt, 3, filter ) ) {
4577 if( p->has_trait( trait_SPIRITUAL ) ) {
4578 p->add_morale( MORALE_TREE_COMMUNION, 2, 30, 8_hours, 6_hours );
4579 } else {
4580 p->add_morale( MORALE_TREE_COMMUNION, 1, 15, 2_hours, 1_hours );
4581 }
4582 if( one_in( 128 ) ) {
4583 p->add_msg_if_player( "%s", SNIPPET.random_from_category( "tree_communion" ).value_or(
4584 translation() ) );
4585 }
4586 return;
4587 }
4588 for( const tripoint_abs_omt &neighbor : points_in_radius( tpt, 1 ) ) {
4589 if( seen.find( neighbor ) != seen.end() ) {
4590 continue;
4591 }
4592 seen.insert( neighbor );
4593 if( !overmap_buffer.ter( neighbor ).obj().is_wooded() ) {
4594 continue;
4595 }
4596 q.push( neighbor );
4597 }
4598 q.pop();
4599 }
4600 p->add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "The trees have shown you what they will." ) );
4601 act->set_to_null();
4602}
4603
4604static void blood_magic( player *p, int cost )
4605{
4606 std::vector<uilist_entry> uile;
4607 std::vector<bodypart_id> parts;
4608 int i = 0;
4609 for( const bodypart_id &bp : p->get_all_body_parts( true ) ) {
4610 const int hp_cur = p->get_part_hp_cur( bp );
4611 uilist_entry entry( i, hp_cur > cost, i + 49, body_part_hp_bar_ui_text( bp ) );
4612
4613 const std::pair<std::string, nc_color> &hp = get_hp_bar( hp_cur, p->get_part_hp_max( bp ) );
4614 entry.ctxt = colorize( hp.first, hp.second );
4615 uile.emplace_back( entry );
4616 parts.push_back( bp );
4617 i++;
4618 }
4619 int action = -1;
4620 while( action < 0 ) {
4621 action = uilist( _( "Choose part\nto draw blood from." ), uile );
4622 }
4623 p->mod_part_hp_cur( parts[action], - cost );
4624 p->mod_pain( std::max( 1, cost / 3 ) );
4625}
4626
4627void activity_handlers::spellcasting_finish( player_activity *act, player *p )
4628{
4629 act->set_to_null();
4630 const int level_override = act->get_value( 0 );
4631 spell_id sp( act->name );
4632
4633 // if level is -1 then we know it's a player spell, otherwise we build it from the ground up
4634 spell temp_spell( sp );
4635 spell &spell_being_cast = ( level_override == -1 ) ? p->magic->get_spell( sp ) : temp_spell;
4636
4637 // if level != 1 then we need to set the spell's level
4638 if( level_override != -1 ) {
4639 while( spell_being_cast.get_level() < level_override && !spell_being_cast.is_max_level() ) {
4640 spell_being_cast.gain_level();
4641 }
4642 }
4643
4644 const bool no_fail = act->get_value( 1 ) == 1;
4645 const bool no_mana = act->get_value( 2 ) == 0;
4646
4647 // choose target for spell (if the spell has a range > 0)
4648
4649 tripoint target = p->pos();
4650 bool target_is_valid = false;
4651 if( spell_being_cast.range() > 0 && !spell_being_cast.is_valid_target( target_none ) &&
4652 !spell_being_cast.has_flag( RANDOM_TARGET ) ) {
4653 do {
4654 avatar &you = *p->as_avatar();
4655 std::vector<tripoint> trajectory = target_handler::mode_spell( you, spell_being_cast, no_fail,
4656 no_mana );
4657
4658 if( !trajectory.empty() ) {
4659 target = trajectory.back();
4660 target_is_valid = spell_being_cast.is_valid_target( *p, target );
4661 if( !( spell_being_cast.is_valid_target( target_ground ) || p->sees( target ) ) ) {
4662 target_is_valid = false;
4663 }
4664 } else {
4665 target_is_valid = false;
4666 }
4667 if( !target_is_valid ) {
4668 if( query_yn( _( "Stop casting spell? Time spent will be lost." ) ) ) {
4669 return;
4670 }
4671 }
4672 } while( !target_is_valid );
4673 } else if( spell_being_cast.has_flag( RANDOM_TARGET ) ) {
4674 const cata::optional<tripoint> target_ = spell_being_cast.random_valid_target( *p, p->pos() );
4675 if( !target_ ) {
4676 p->add_msg_if_player( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
4677 _( "Your spell can't find a suitable target." ) );
4678 return;
4679 }
4680 target = *target_;
4681 }
4682
4683 // no turning back now. it's all said and done.
4684 bool success = no_fail || rng_float( 0.0f, 1.0f ) >= spell_being_cast.spell_fail( *p );
4685 int exp_gained = spell_being_cast.casting_exp( *p );
4686 if( !success ) {
4687 p->add_msg_if_player( game_message_params{ m_bad, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
4688 _( "You lose your concentration!" ) );
4689 if( !spell_being_cast.is_max_level() && level_override == -1 ) {
4690 // still get some experience for trying
4691 spell_being_cast.gain_exp( exp_gained / 5 );
4692 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You gain %i experience. New total %i." ), exp_gained / 5,
4693 spell_being_cast.xp() );
4694 }
4695 return;
4696 }
4697
4698 if( spell_being_cast.has_flag( spell_flag::VERBAL ) ) {
4699 sounds::sound( p->pos(), p->get_shout_volume() / 2, sounds::sound_t::speech, _( "cast a spell" ),
4700 false );
4701 }
4702
4703 p->add_msg_if_player( spell_being_cast.message(), spell_being_cast.name() );
4704
4705 spell_being_cast.cast_all_effects( *p, target );
4706
4707 if( !no_mana ) {
4708 // pay the cost
4709 int cost = spell_being_cast.energy_cost( *p );
4710 switch( spell_being_cast.energy_source() ) {
4711 case mana_energy:
4712 p->magic->mod_mana( *p, -cost );
4713 break;
4714 case stamina_energy:
4715 p->mod_stamina( -cost );
4716 break;
4717 case bionic_energy:
4718 p->mod_power_level( -units::from_kilojoule( cost ) );
4719 break;
4720 case hp_energy:
4721 blood_magic( p, cost );
4722 break;
4723 case fatigue_energy:
4724 p->mod_fatigue( cost );
4725 break;
4726 case none_energy:
4727 default:
4728 break;
4729 }
4730 }
4731 if( level_override == -1 ) {
4732 if( !spell_being_cast.is_max_level() ) {
4733 // reap the reward
4734 int old_level = spell_being_cast.get_level();
4735 if( old_level == 0 ) {
4736 spell_being_cast.gain_level();
4737 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good,
4738 _( "Something about how this spell works just clicked! You gained a level!" ) );
4739 } else {
4740 spell_being_cast.gain_exp( exp_gained );
4741 p->add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You gain %i experience. New total %i." ), exp_gained,
4742 spell_being_cast.xp() );
4743 }
4744 if( spell_being_cast.get_level() != old_level ) {
4745 g->events().send<event_type::player_levels_spell>( spell_being_cast.id(),
4746 spell_being_cast.get_level() );
4747 }
4748 }
4749 }
4750}

4770 studying.gain_exp( xp );
4771 }
